name: Chicken Majestic
desc: This dish has its origins in Hyderabad, India. Chicken Majestic is a dry chicken dish marinated with Indian spices with an appealing look. Elders or youngers this chicken dish always tempt you to have more. A huge gettogether or small parties this is amazing starter dish to serve your guests.
instructions:
Marinate chicken strips in buttermilk and salt (to taste) for 2 to 3 hours.
In a bowl, add marinated chicken, corn flour, salt, egg, ginger garlic paste, 1/2 teaspoon of oil, mix it well and rest for 1-2 hours in the refrigerator then deep fry the chicken till cooked.
Heat oil in a pan, add chopped garlic, sliced green chillies, chopped curry leaves, mint leaves, turmeric powder, red chili powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, curd, salt, MSG (optional), mix it.
Then add soya sauce, fried chicken strips and toss them.
At last, garnish with chopped coriander and lime juice. Serve it hot.

name: Aloo ki Roti
desc: The whole potatoes boiled and incorporated with the regular roti atta with the addition of some faring ingredients and cooked on a hot tava.
instructions:
Take a bowl, add boiled and grated potato, ajwain, salt, chopped green chilies, onion, coriander, finely chopped ginger.
Then add all-purpose flour, wheat flour, baking powder, mix it like a dough.
Divide the dough into equal portions, with the help of rolling pin to make chapattis.
 Cook each roti on both sides on a griddle till golden brown using butter.

name: Paneer Pasanda Pakoda
desc: Paneer pasanda is a dish from the Mughlai cuisine served as a snack.
instructions:
Take paneer square pieces, cut them in a pocket shape and stuff with favorite pickle, keep it aside.
Take a bowl add chickpea flour, salt, carom seeds, chili powder, cooking soda, mix it like a thick batter. Dip the paneer slices in the batter and deep fry them.
Cut the fried paneer pasanda pakoda and sprinkle chat masala on it. Enjoy this snack.

name: Moong Dal Puri
desc: Moong Dal puri is a fantastic puffed Indian bread made with all-purpose flour combined with soaked moong.
instructions:
First, soak the moong dal for 2 hours and keep it aside.
To the soaked moong dal, add cumin seeds, spring onions, ginger (optional), put it into the blender and make a paste.
Take a bowl add all purpose flour, salt, chili powder, asafoetida, mix this.
Later even add prepared paste along with some water, mix it like a soft dough and let it rest for about 15 minutes.
Divide the dough into equal portions and make them puris and deep fry them in the hot oil.Delicious and Healthy Moong dal puri is now ready to serve with any curry or Korma.

name: KALA JAMUN STUFFED
desc: Kala Jamun, a dark brown color jamuns coated with desiccated coconut powder is a variation to normal gulab jamuns which are larger in size when compared to the gulab jamuns and also much tastier.

name: LEMON CORIANDER SOUP
desc: An herbed flavour tangy soup. This Lemon coriander soup presents the lovely combination of lime juice and fresh coriander leaves with vegetable stuffing in the wontons.
instructions:
In a strainer, take dry lemon grass, coriander stem and zest of lemon.
Now keep this in a boiling water and let it infuse in water to give a nice flavor.
In a hot pan, add chopped mushroom, garlic, ginger, cabbage, carrot, green chilies, spring onions and cook it for few minutes.
Season it with salt, crushed pepper and stir fry for few minutes.
Now add cornstarch and cook for some more time.
Add soya sauce and mix it properly. Keep it aside.
To make wonton sheet,  take all purpose flour (gluten rich flour), turmeric powder and water in a bowl. Mix it and make a dough.
Roll it long and cut in round shapes (like pooris) to make wontons.
Keep the stuffing mixture on the small pooris and wet the edges with water to seal it by folding.  Now join the edges again with the help of water.  
Remove the strainer from water and reduce the flame. Season it with  sugar, salt and tasting salt in it.
Drop in the wontons in water and squeeze in some lime juice. Let the wontons cook for 3-4 mins.
Once the wontons start floating they seem to be cooked. Take these wontons in a bowl and add fresh coriander leaves . Fill the bowl with the stock.Enjoy this hot lemon coriander soup with lot of  fresh vegetables.

name: CHICKEN POT BIRYANI
desc: Biryani is traditionally associated with the Mughlai cuisine . In chicken pot biryani version where all the ingredients are placed in one pot and cooked on the stove top.
instructions:
Marinate chicken with turmeric powder, red chili powder, salt and mix nicely. Let it rest for overnight.
Slightly crush cloves, cardamom, star anise, cinnamon stick with pestle.
Take a mixie jar and add chopped mint leaves, coriander leaves, green chilies, blend into a green paste.
Heat oil in a pot, add bay leaves, black cumin seeds, slightly crushed spices and saute it. 
To it, add slices of onions, little salt and cook it, later add ginger garlic paste, pinch of turmeric powder, prepared green paste, saute it for about a minute.
Then add dry coriander powder, little red chili powder, garam masala powder, yogurt, and mix it.
Later add marinated chicken and check for seasoning.
Soak rice for about 30 minutes, remove water from the rice.
To the pot, add water, rice and mix slightly and cook it with closed lid first on high flame, later on slow flame until rice is cooked.Now the chicken pot biryani is ready to serve with raitha.

name: Green Apple Pickle
desc: We all have grown up eating delicious, crunchy and tangy pickles made by our grandmothers and mothers. No meal is complete without them. Spike your food with Green Apple Pickle, eat it with rice, its sour and hot taste titillates the taste buds.
instructions:
Roast cinnamon stick, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, fenugreek seeds and blend to coarse powder.
In a pan, add peanut oil, salt, chopped green apple pieces, turmeric powder, curry leaves, red chili powder, raw tamarind pulp, sugar, green chillies, red chillies, and cook it well.
Then add prepared masala powder and cook it well.
Now, transfer to bowl and serve it with rice or roti.

name: RIDGE GOURD AND POTATO CURRY
desc: A Bengali ridge gourd potato curry recipe using a creative combination of ingredients, with spices.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan and add onions, salt, turmeric powder and saute it.
Add ridge gourd, tomatoes,Green chili paste, coriander powder, cumin seeds powder, ginger garlic paste and cook with lid on, until it is nice and soft.
Remove lid and add fresh grated coconut, boiled and chopped potato, garam masala and mix nicely and place lid and cook it for 3 minutes.Now ridge gourd and potato curry is ready to serve.

name: FATTA FAT CHUTNEY - GRATED CARROT MUSTARD PICKLE
desc: This a instant pickle prepared with carrot served with rice.
instructions: Take a bowl and add carrot, cumin seeds, julians of ginger, chopped garlic, mustard powder, red chili powder, vinegar, salt and mix nicelyNow carrot pickle is ready to serve.

name: EGG IN BUTTER TOMATO GRAVY
desc: EGG IN BUTTER TOMATO GRAVY : Sometimes, if I have it on hand, I use bacon drippings instead of the butter to give it another layer of taste.tomato gravy and cream and cook for sometime. ...
instructions:
Take a pan, add oil, cashew nuts, chopped onion, chopped tomato, red chili powder and mix it well.
Then add ginger garlic paste to it and saute all these for few minutes.
In another pan, add kasoori methi, saute for few minutes and make a powder with hands.
Then take it in a separate plate. Now take cooked tomato in a electric blender, make it fine paste and keep aside.
Take a pan, add butter, kasoori methi powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala.
To it even add tomato mixture paste along with some water and salt as per taste. saute it for few minutes.
Add sugar and boiled eggs to the above pan and mix it well. Finally add fresh cream and saute for few more minutes. Serve it with hot rice.

name: SOYA SAUCE FISH CURRY
desc: Soya sauce fish curry is exceptionally full of flavors and tasty to enjoy at any time to prepare with minimum requirements.
instructions:
Take a pan and add water, chopped brinjal, chopped red and green capsicum, chopped onion, now cook the vegetable stock.
Then take a plate add fish pieces, salt as per taste, corn flour, maida, red chili powder and mix it well.
Later take a pan add oil to deep fry and fry fish pieces. Transfer to a separate plate.
Now take a bowl add soya sauce, vinegar, red chili sauce, red chili paste, tomato ketchup, ajinomoto, cumin powder, coriander powder, sugar along with boiled vegetable stock and mix it well.
Take a pan, add oil when it is hot enough, add chopped garlic, chopped ginger, chopped onion, chopped red and green capsicum. Saute all these nicely.
Now add sauces and cook it well. Add fried fish pieces and corn flour water and saute all these nicely.Now serve with rice.

name: Horlicks Oats Choco Laddu
desc: Laddu is one sweet which no one can stop with one and if it is served with added goodness of horlicks oats then no chance of saying no even after the second one
instructions:
Roast horlicks oats using butter for about 3 - 4 minutes and transfer to a bowl.
Add chopped dates, cashew nuts, almonds, cocoa powder, icing sugar to the same bowl and mix well.
Now make   the mixture little moist by adding   boiled  milk in small quantities and mix well.
Then proceed by shaping the mixture into laddus of your desired sizes.Delicious Horlicks Oats Choco Laddu is now ready to serve.

name: Veg Chops Curry
desc: Vegetable chops curry, a delectable combination of mixed vegetables is a must try dish.

name: Oats Chocolate Ladoo
desc: Oats Chocolate Ladoo serves as a quick byte and is equally enjoyed by every age group.
instructions:
Dry roast oats till oats turns light brown in color.
In the same pan, add coco powder, icing sugar, finely chopped dates and saute it well.
Now, transfer this to a bowl, add chocolate, crushed cashew nuts, almonds and mix well.
Then by adding milk in small quantities,  shape the mixture into ladoos. Delicious Oats Chocolate Ladoo is now ready to serve.

name: Horlicks Oats Banana Cake
desc: Horlicks Oats Banana Cake is a delicious cake recipe to relish any time by all age groups.
instructions:
In a blender, add jaggery and banana pieces then blend to a fine paste by adding oil.
Now, add curd to blended jaggery and banana mixture, keep it aside.
Take a bowl, add horlicks oats powder, milk powder, baking powder, mix well.
To it, add earlier prepared curd mixture in small quantities and whisk it to prepare a cake batter until no lumps are formed.
Add vanilla essence, raisins to the same bowl and whisk it again.
Later take a cake mould, grease it with butter then place butter paper in the bottom.
At last, pour the cake batter in it and bake at 180 degree centigrade for 30 minutes.
Demold the cake in a plate, remove the butter paper.
Delicious Horlicks Oats Banana Cake is now ready to serve.

name: pesarattu pulusu
desc: Pesarattu is a pancake made with Moong dal (green gram), made into dumpling and cooked in tamarind gravy. In southern Indian states, Mung batter is used to make crepes named pesarattu
instructions:
preparation of Attu :
1. Soak Moong dal in water for 2-3 hours. Remove entire water from Moong dal. Add green chilli, ginger and salt to Moong dal and prepare fine paste. 2. Then take a pan and pour oil heat for 2 min. Then place moong dal paste to make thick size Attu. 3. Note: prepare attu immediately after preparation of moongdal paste.
Preparation of Pulusu:
1. heat oil in a pan add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, broken red chilli2. Add ginger, garlicpaste and add chopped onion and saute for 2 -3min add salt ,turmeric paste add green chillies ,curry leaves 3. Add required amount of water. boil the pulusu for min 25min in a low flame.4. Now cut the pesarattu pieces in desired size 5. Add Attu pieces to pulusu and boil for 5 min.(adding sugar is optional). 6. Remove it from stove .server it after one hour.

name: Basic Lamb Curry
desc: Lamb curry is popular dish from the Kashmiri cuisine known as Rogan josh.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan, add cinnamon, green cardamom, cloves, cumin seeds, chopped onion and cook till they are slightly brown at the edges.
Add salt, turmeric powder, ginger garlic paste and saute it.
Add cleaned lamb pieces and cook for some time.
Then add chili powder, coriander powder, cumin powder and mix it.
Add water and cook for 20-30 minutes till lamb is 90%cooked  (You can also cook lamb in a pressure cooker).
Add green chillies, coconut powder and pepper powder, coriander leaves and cook for another 10 minutes till the sauce is thickened.Serve hot with rice, roti or naan by sprinkling coriander leaves on top.

name: Lamb Fry
desc: Traditionally a lip smacking mutton recipe with a delectable flavors of fresh peppercorns, garlic and cumin seeds embedded in the masalas and mutton pieces.
instructions:
In a heavy bottom pan add some oil and when oil is hot add whole garam masala.
When it splutters add cumin seeds add chop onions for this preparation.
We dont have to brown the onions and add turmeric and ginger garlic paste and once the ginger garlic paste is cooked add nicely clean cubes of lamb or mutton and add little water to it and cook till meat is tender.
Make sure your lamb is fully cooked as we are not going to cook this lamb in a gravy or anything.
Take some garlic and little bit of cumin seeds and pepper corns grind it.
In a pan melt the butter and mix the pestled powders, after 5 seconds add green chili and curry leaves.
Add red chili powder, cumin powder, and coriander powder.
After adding these to the lamb we use the bigger pan for evaporating the moisture.
Add the chopped coriander leaves to garnish and add little lime juice to it.

name: Christmas Fruit Cake
desc: The Christmas fruitcake is a luscious cake made with chopped candied fruits, dried fruits, nuts and spices soaked either in rum or brandy.
instructions:
In a bowl add to butter mix well then add sugar mix well then add eggs mix well and keep aside.
In another bowl add flour, baking powder, spice powder mix well add this mixture to egg and sugar mixture and mix well then add all the dry fruits.
Pour this mixture in a cake bowl grease with butter and flour. baking 325 f for 45 minutes, or more time depending on the size, depth of the cake make sure to check if the cake is done by inserting a knife edge,
If it comes out clean it is done

name: Chicken curry authentic
desc: Andhra Chicken curry is a popular delicacy all over South India and Southeast Asia. Indian chicken curry made with freshly grounded spices is a delight to have.
instructions:
Apply Turmeric paste on whole chicken and dry roast on stove top till chicken turns light brown in color and cut it into small pieces.
Dry Roast poppy seeds until they splutter, then add coconut powder and cook for another 1 minute and grind to a thick paste.
Heat oil in a pan, add whole garam masala (cloves, cardamom, cinnamon), cumin seeds and saute until they splutter.
Add chopped onions in the same pan and cook till they turn light brown.
Then add salt, ginger garlic paste and turmeric powder and cook for another 2 minutes.
In the same pan, add prepared paste, coriander powder, chilli powder, curry leaves and mix it well.
Now add chicken pieces along with water and cook it with a lid.
At last season with crushed peppercorns and chopped coriander leaves and switch off the flame let it rest for another 5 minutes.Delicious Chicken curry is ready to serve with hot rice.

name: Jangri
desc: Jangri or Jhangri is also known as Imarti or Emarti in the northern India. Made from urad dal, deep fried and soaked in sugar syrup.
instructions:
Wash and soak the dal for atleast 1 hr.
Drain the water and grind to a very fine paste till the consistency of glue sticking add saffron color and rice flour if needed add to ziplock bag and pipe it into a slightly hot oil.
Put them into sugar syrup as shown for not more than few minutes serve hot.

name: Eggless Sponge Cake
desc: Eggless sponge cake is one such cake which is a boon to them and can equally enjoy eating delicious eggless cakes and relish it like others do.
instructions:
Preheat the oven for 15 mins 400 F.
For this cake we have to use cookie sheet so prepare them by spraying with non-stick spray and keep aside.
In a bowl or mixer if you have take 200ml of condensed milk or plain milk,add powdered sugar and mix it.
Whisk until well mixed. melt the butter and add it when warm to the sugar mixture and beat until mixed well.
Now take the dry ingredients the 2 1/2 cups all purpose flour add 1/2 cup of coco powder,add 1tablespoon  of baking powder and mix everything well.now add the wet ingrdient in the flour mixture and just mix it.
now add the soda i.e. coke and mix everything well it should be not be too thick.
now divide the batter evenly on the two prepared sheets,just tap the sheets inorder the spread evenly and remove the air bubble.
Put these sheets in the preheated oven at 400F for 15mins and switch of immediately and let it be in the oven for next 15 mins.do not remove them let them cook in switched off oven.remove them and let them cool completely before doing any icing.

name: HOT AND SOUR VEGETABLE SOUP
desc: Hot and sour vegetable soup prepared instantly is the best option when you like to light meal.
instructions:
Take a vegetable stock powder, to it add around 3 cups of water and let it boil.
Then add soya sauce,  rice vinegar, chili sauce as required, pepper, sugar.
All vegetables,  slices of ginger, mushroom, green onion, ajinomoto, salt and boil this once.
When it comes to boil, add sesame oil, then mix corn flour in water and add this to the above vegetable stock along with tofu, bring this to boil again as thicker you want.
Take a serving bowl, add spring onions and soup into it.

name: Shahi Pulao
desc: Shahi pulao is a mix vegetable pulao made with a difference and tastes good with curd and pickle.
instructions:
Take a pan add oil, black cumin, sugar, mix this till the sugar change its color to brown.
Now add sliced onions, mix them then add ginger garlic paste, chopped green chilies, mint leaves, coriander leaves, salt and mix well.
Then add the rice which was soaked for 30 minutes, let it come to boil.
Once water absorbed then cook with closed lid for 5 minutes on a very slow flame.
If you want to add fried onions and cook it for another 5 minutes.

name: Shahi Paneer
desc: Shahi Paneer is a very popular and rich vegetarian recipe.
instructions:
Take a pan add oil, whole garam masala,  cumin seeds, onion salt mix well then add ginger-garlic paste, pepper powder, coriander powder, make almond past add the past and add water cook for 30minutes.
Cover with the lid then add paneer, garam masala, khoya mix well and cook for 5minutes if required add cream and bring it to boil.shahi paneer is ready.

name: Seena With Raisins Curry
desc: Seena with raisins curry is made of tender lower ribs of lamb and raisins cooked in a spicy gravy.
instructions:
Take a blender, add raisins, red chilies, half of the chopped onions, vinegar, blend it till a fine paste.
Take a presure cooker, add oil, garam masala (cloves, cinnamon, cardamom), cumin seeds, rest of the remaining onion, salt, mix well.
Then add  ginger garlic paste, turmeric powder and saute it.
Add the blended paste to the above pan and cook for 2 minutes.
In it, even add seena mutton, coriander powder, cumin powder, coconut powder, mix well, if required add water, cook it with closed lid on slow flame till mutton is tender.
Onces the mutton is cooked for around 30 minutes,  remove the lid and cook till water evaporates then season it with garam masala powder, chopped coriander leaves.Delicious Seena With Raisins Curry is now ready to serve.

name: Pappu Charu
desc: Pappu charu recipe is a simple traditional andhra recipe like the sambar but made without using sambar powder.
instructions:
Boil Dal and mash keep it a side.Take pan add oil, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, red chillis dry, onions, hing, turmeric, curry leaves, green chillies, ginger garlic paste, tomatos mix well and now add tamarind juice, chilli powder, salt cook till it comes to boil then. 
Add some more water as need let it come to boil again.Now add boiled dal and mix well,now add sugar, ghee and cook for 5 minutes.

name: Gongura Pappu
desc: Gongura pappu is one of the delicious pappu recipe from Andhra cuisine.
instructions:
Wash gongura and keep it aside.
Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, dry red chillies, peanuts and saute it.
Now add crushed garlic, sliced onions, turmeric powder, chopped curry leaves, green chillies, salt and mix well.
In the same pan, add sorrel leaves along with left over water of boiled dal and cook it for about 5 minutes.
Then add boiled dal and cook by adding salt in small quantities (to taste) till gravy looses its mushy consistency. Delicious Gongura Pappu is now ready to serve.

name: cold coffee - Shake
desc: Easy and quick recipe for cold coffee milk shake made with coffee.
instructions:
Take a bowl add coffee powder add hot water mix well.
Take a blender add ice cubes, coffee mixture, milk, vannila ice cream, sugar and blend it.
Pour it in a glass and add ice cream on top or sprinkle coffee powder or grate chocolate.

name: Frankie - Katti Roll
desc: Kathi Roll stand at almost every corner of Delhi. It is also known as Frankie in a lot of different regions.
instructions:
Take a bowl, add maida, wheat flour, salt, 1 teaspoon of oil, mix well then add water to make a soft dough, keep it side for 15 minutes.
Slice tomato, onion, bell pepper and keep it a side. Beat an egg and keep it a side.
Take a pan, add oil, cumin seeds, crushed ginger and garlic , onion, cook till onions are golden brown.
Then add turmeric powder, chopped tomatoes , chopped bell pepper, chill powder, coriander powder, cumin powder along with 1/4  cup of water, mix well and cook for 5 minutes.
To it, even add chicken to it, mix well and cook with closed lid till this chicken is tender, then add chaat masala, lemon juice, coriander leaves and keep it aside.
Now take the dough, make a thin chapati, apply oil spread all over, then sprinkle maida fold it.
Later fold the sheet like strips as shown in video, circle it and press in center, rest it for 10 minutes.
After 10 minutes, roll it again into a chapati, add it to tava cook both the side lightly, apply oil one side then spread beaten egg on top spread and turn it over.
Once it is cooked, transfer it to a plate then add the cooked chicked mixture, sprinkle sliced onions, tomatoes, bellpepper, lemon juice, roll the chapati as frankie.Serve it hot.

name: Cheese Chilli Toast
desc: Cheese Chilli Toast is an easy-to-make breakfast recipe.
instructions:
Take a bowl add cheese, finely chopped green chillies, pepper powder, oregano, salt and mix it well.
Then add cream, paprica and mix well, later add chopped tomatoes (without seeds).
Now take bread slices roast the bread slightly then spread the cheese mixture evenly.
Put in the oven in broil mode or in a convention mode till you get the colour.

name: Mexican Sweet Corn
desc: Mexican Sweet Corn works brilliantly as a side-dish with pizza. Healthy time pass snack with extra flavors of cheese and butter.
instructions:
Take butter, salt water,Corn on the cob cook in the presure cooker.
Once it is done top it of with mayonnaise, sprinkle chesee and chilli powder.

name: Tiramisu desi style
desc: Tiramisu is traditionally an Italian dessert, and this is a similar recipe with an Indian twist.
instructions:
Take fresh Curd hang in muslin cloth for 1hour, after 1 hour remove from the cloth and put in a bowl add sugar as required and mix well.
Make Custard, thick custard mixture keep a side.take Cream whisk well till it gets thick.
Now add curd mixture,custard mixture, cream mixture,whipping cream. if required whiskey mix well keep a side.
Now in a bowl add coffee powder,add warm water, grape juice mix well take the lady finger biscuit dip in the coffee mixture and place in a dish as one layer, now pour Half of the curd,custard,cream mixture on top of it.repeat the same once again,top it of with coco powder with tea strainer.
keep this in fridge for at least 4 hours.remove after 4 hours and serve cold.

name: Garlic pepper meat balls
desc: Garlic pepper meat balls are a popular snack dish.
instructions:
Take a pan add oil, add cumin seeds, onions, salt, cook till lightbrown colour, then add turmeric, ginger garlic paste, mix well, then chilli powder, coriander powder, chopped coriander leaves mix will and switch off the flame and cool it down.
In a bowl take sooji add water and soake it for 2minutes.
In another bowl take meat mince, add sooji remove water,then onion masala mix well if require add salt, chilli powder, egg min well and make into small balls and keep a side.
In the same pan add oil, garlic cloves chopped then add the meat ball cook all the sides, then add chopped green chillies, pepper crushed, soy sauce mix well and cook for 3-5minutes and switch off the flame.Transfer into a plate.

name: SABUDANA/ SAGO KHICHDI
desc: Sabudana Khichdi is an excellent Maharashtrian breakfast dish made with sago pearls, spiced with green chillies and seasoned with roasted peanuts and fresh coconut.
instructions:
In a bowl, soak the sabudana with just enough water to barely cover the sabudana and soak for 4-6 hours. Drain the water and keep aside. If required you can also soak it overnight.
Wash and cut the potato into pieces and soak them in water or else they get oxidized and decolored. Keep this aside.
Add one teaspoon of oil to a frying pan and roast the peanuts. Remove the skin, and grind the peanuts into a coarse powder. Set aside.
Then add one and half tablespoon of ghee, add cumin seeds, few curry leaves, chopped green chilies and saute it.
Later, add chopped potato pieces, mix well and half cook the potatoes.
In the same pan, add soaked sabudana, salt, sugar and mix well.
To it, even add crushed roasted peanuts, and cook with closed lid for 5 minutes. Mix in-between and cook until the sabudana is done and transparent.
Finish it off with ground coconut and this is ready to serve.

name: COCONUT CHUTNEY MAHARASHTRIAN STYLE
desc: Coconut chutney is a simple dish made with coconut, garlic, green chillies and spices. This chutney is typically made in Maharashtrian style.
instructions:
Grind together coconut, green chillies, garlic, cumin seeds, salt, sugar and coriander leaves, blend to a coarse paste.
Transfer to a bowl and sprinkle few drops of lemon juice.This is freshly made and served often with vada pav, kanda bhajiya and various other snacks.

name: VEGETABLE KOLHAPURI
desc: This is a popular spicy mixed vegetable Kolhapuri preparation which is a semi-dry vegetable dish cooked with spices as the base for the gravy.
instructions:
Wash the vegetables and cut into half inch sized cubes. Boil in sufficient quantity of boiling salted water till nearly done. Drain the water, cool and fry them in little oil and keep aside.
Boil the cashew nuts and watermelon seeds until soft and then grind to smooth paste. Keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds, cloves, cinnamon, black cardamom and bay leaves. Saute well till they infuse their flavours well in the oil.
Add curry leaves, onion paste, salt and saute it well, till the onions paste is nicely browned. Add freshly crushed ginger, garlic, green chillies and mix.
Add hing, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, garam masala, cumin powder, coriander powder, tomato paste and mix all the spices well. Add little water and allow it to cook.
Then add 1 cup green peas (boiled), 2 tablespoons of cashew nut and watermelon seeds paste. Stir and cook on a slow flame for 15 minutes until the sauce is smooth and spluttering out.
Add the boiled and fried vegetables, paneer and mix well. Add little water to dilute the consistency if thickened and bring to a boil. Simmer for 2 minutes and add kasuri methi and mix well. Switch off the flame.
At last, add little ghee in a pan and fry whole red chillies, pour this tadka onto the Vegetable Kolhapuri mixture and top it off with finely chopped coriander leaves and serve hot.

name: BATATA SUKA BHAJI POTATOES MAHARASHTRIAN STYLE
desc: This is a typical Maharashtrian dish made with potatoes that are boiled and tempered with a simple seasoning of cumin seeds, garlic, ginger, green chillies and fresh coconut.
instructions:
Add some oil in a hot pan and when the oil gets hot, add mustard seeds, when they crackle, add cumin seeds, chopped green chillies, curry leaves, crushed garlic and ginger, saute till the raw flavours are gone.
Add a pinch of turmeric powder, hing, salt and boiled potatoes cut into small pieces.
Sprinkle little sugar and toss the ingredients well.
Add finely chopped coriander leaves, freshly ground coconut and toss until all the ingredients are mixed thoroughly then switch off the flame after 2 minutes.Now ready to serve batata suka bhaji potato

name: KEKDA MASALA CRAB MASALA MAHARASHTRIAN STYLE
desc: Kekda Masala or Crab Masala is a delicious crab dish made in a Maharashtrian style influenced by Malvani cuisine - masala using spices and coconut.
instructions:
Heat a pan and dry roast coriander seeds, cumin seeds, red chillies, peppercorn, cinnamon sticks, and cardamom.
Once they start releasing their aroma, add 1 tablespoon oil, 1 cup of chopped onions and saute until the onions turn golden in colour.
Add some grated coconut and cook till it gets browned, remove and make a paste of these ingredients in the blender and keep aside.
Add some oil in a hot pan add chopped onions, salt and saute until the golden turn golden in colour.
Add crushed garlic, ginger and green chillies.
Add some turmeric powder, garam masala and masala mix (red chilli powder and Malvani masala).
To this add 1 cup tomato puree and mix well.
Add 1 tablespoon of the masala paste (ground at the first).
Add crab (cleaned and cut into pieces), water enough to cover all the crab pieces and mix, cover the pan with a lid and allow cooking for about 10-12 minutes until the crab is cooked.
Add freshly ground coconut along with coconut milk to the mixture and mix well.
Sprinkle some chopped coriander leaves and switch off the flame.

name: KURMA BHAJI
desc: A typical Maharashtrian style Kurma curry combined with mixed vegetables cooked in a spicy, tangy and nutty flavoured gravy.
instructions:
Add 2 tbsp of oil in hot pan, add mustard seeds and when they crackle, add cumin seeds, cloves and cinnamon.
Add chopped onions, curry leaves, salt to taste, crushed garlic and chopped green chillies. Fry the onions well till they are slightly golden in colour. Reduce the flame and add a pinch of hing, turmeric, red chilli powder, garam masala, goda masala and coriander powder. Mix all the spices well together.
 Add cauliflower florets, carrot pieces, green peas, potato pieces and saute for a minute and add water for cooking the vegetables. Cover the pan with a lid and cook for about 10 minutes on a slow flame until the vegetable is soft and tender. Remove the lid and add chopped tomatoes, jaggery, freshly ground coconut and mix gently. 
Add roasted peanut powder and mix. Finally sprinkle chopped coriander leaves and switch off the flame.

name: POPCORN PANEER WITH HOMEMADE CHEESE
desc: Popcorn Paneer is wonderful mini crispies, a lip-smacking snack made with fresh homemade cheese (paneer), mixed with spices fried and tossed with herbs to give that extra punch to taste.
instructions:
In a bowl add grated cheese, tomato ketchup, cumin powder, red chilli powder, a pinch of salt, grated paneer, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, and breadcrumbs, mix all these ingredients together and knead to form a dough.
Gently squeeze out small popcorn size dumplings and keep aside or else roll the dough into thin cylindrical shape and cut into small piece (as shown in the video).
In a plate mix equal quantities of corn flour, all-purpose flour and salt then mix well.
Remove half the quantity of the flours, in another plate.
Add little water in one portion of the flour quantity and make a smooth paste free of lumps.
Drop the small dumpling into the flour batter and coat them well, remove and drop into the other portion of the dry flour, coat it and keep aside.
Coat the entire dumplings in the same process.
Heat oil in a pan and when the oil is hot, fry the coated dumplings in a medium hot oil until they turn slightly golden in colour and crisp.
For the popcorn masala: in a bowl add chaat masala, parmesan cheese (optional), and marjoram spice, mix the spices together and sprinkle over the fried popcorn paneer.

name: Methi Vadi
desc: Try this easy Methi Vadi recipe and make delicious Methi Vadi at home using this simple recipe from Awesome Cuisine.
instructions:
In a bowl, mix all the ingredients, except for the oil, and make into a little softer dough than chapati dough.
Use water only if you need to, as the methi, salt and onion will release moisture enough to make the dough.
Then make into one inch balls and flatten them to look like patties and set aside.
Now heat oil in a non-stick skillet and lay out the vadis, and fry about 5-7 minutes on each side till they turn golden brown and crisp.
The baking soda and onion in the mixture will allow it to stay soft inside, while the outside will be nice and crisp.Enjoy this dish with chutney, ketchup or plain all by itself. Enjoy.

name: FISH IN GARLIC SAUCE
desc: Incredibly simple, remarkably delicious--this is a dish that's elegant enough for entertaining and fast enough to brighten weeknight dinner.
instructions:
Take a fish,  make gashes on both sides. Dry fish using a paper towel. There should not be any moisture in it.
Take a bowl add Soy sauce, vinegar, mixes it and pour the sauce on the fish properly, so sauce goes inside.
Marinate it for 15 minutes. After that, sprinkle corn flour on fish and dredge it.
 Heat oil in a pan, add fish. cook on the slow flame.
Take another pan heat oil add chopped garlic, ginger, slices of onions and saute it till garlic goes slightly brown.
Then add chili sauce, Soy sauce, tomato ketchup,  jaggery or brown sugar, salt, lemon juice, fish stock and mix it well.
Then add chopped white of spring onion.
Take the sauce and pour it on the fried fish.
Lastly, garnish with sliced red bell pepper, spring onion and shredded cabbage.My favorite Fish in Garlic Sauce is ready to serve.

name: LAUKI MUSALLAM
desc: Lauki Musallam is a stuffed curry which is a healthy to have on any special occasion to have a royal and an authentic touch.
instructions:
Take a fork and punch on the peeled lauki ( bottle gourd) put salt on it and rub it, remove the centre part of the lauki.
Take some water in a pan add salt, turmeric and lauki cook it till 50%done take it aside.
Take a bowl add boiled green peas, broken cashew nuts, raisins, chopped green chillies, chopped coriander, salt, cardamom powder, coconut powder, mashed potatoes, khoya mix all of this like a dough.
Take boiled lauki and stuff the mixture and cut them into pieces.
Heat ghee in a pan add chopped ginger garlic, chopped onions, salt, turmeric, chilli powder, cumin powder, add tomatoes, cook for some time, add cashew nut paste and mix it.
Add yoghurt along with water, let it cook for 8 minutes.
Then add garam masala powder place the stuffed pieces and cook for some time on a slow flame. Then add cream, switch off the flame, add saffron. Lauki Musallam is ready to serve

name: Ram Pulao (Gatta Pulao)
desc: An easy-to-make khichdi from the gujarati town of kathiyavad! A perfect combination of dals, rice and loads of mixed vegetables makes this khichdi nutritious and filling, with a melange of flavors and textures that are irresistible. Enjoy this spicy one-dish meal with low-fat curds, or with kadhi and papad.
instructions:
For gattas, in a bowl take coriander seeds and crush them, add chili powder, turmeric powder, hing, salt and mix it. Add besan, oil, yogurt, mix it up like a dough.
Make small dumplings. Add the dumplings into the boiling water and put the lid on, let it boil for 10 minutes.
Once it get boiled, drain them cool and cut into small pieces.
Heat oil in a deep pan, fry gatta pieces into hot oil and keep it aside.
Heat ghee in another pan, add cinnamon, cumin seeds,  cloves, raisins, cashew nuts and saute them.
Add boiled green peas, turmeric powder, chili powder, salt, gatta, coriander leaves, mix it well and switched off the flame.
Now add cooked rice and mix or toss it perfectly.Ram pulao is ready to serve.

name: Pointed gourd  Parval nu Shaak
desc: Parwal Nu Shaak-A typical Gujarati Vegetable dish
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, ginger garlic paste, add parval vegetable, salt, hing, turmeric powder, and saute this for 1 minute, put the lid on.
After cooking in the add coriander powder, chilly powder, garam masala, cook for some time, add coriander leaves and switched off the flame. Serve this with rice, chapattis.

name: Tomato sweet chutney with Dates and Mango Aam papad
desc: Sweet tomato chutney is one of the best Indian relishes. This chutney recipe is made in the Bengali style with mango aam papad.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan add mustard seeds, whole red chilly, cumin seeds, fennel seeds, cardamom, sugar turmeric powder, grated ginger, cashew nuts, chopped tomatoes cook this till tomatoes cooked.
Add, salt, cook this few minutes, add chopped dates, mango Aam papad (mamidi tandra), raisins, chat masala, cook it for 3 to 4 minutes.

name: Sesame Kadai Mix Vegetable Curry
desc: Sesame kadai mix vegetable curry is cooked in a spicy tomato based gravy with kadai masala and topped with some sesame seeds
instructions:
Heat a pan, add whole red chilies, coriander seeds, peppercorns, whole garam masala spices (cardamom, cloves, star anise, cinnamon stick), dry roast them on slow flame.
After that, even add black sesame seeds, white sesame seeds, cumin seeds, kasoori methi, kalonji (optional), saute it. Later,  put in a blender and make it into a coarse powder.
Heat oil in a pan, add chopped onion, salt, cook this till onions are brown.
Then add ginger garlic paste, cook till raw flavor is gone.
To it, add turmeric powder, half of the made masala, green chilies, chopped tomatoes, tomato puree, red chili paste, cook this with closed lid for 10 minutes.
Season it with sugar, diced onion, capsicum along with water and let it cook for 2 more minutes.
In the same pan, add boiled green peas, carrot, beans, potatoes, paneer, mix it well, cook it with closed lid for another 4 to 5 minutes, then sprinkle leftover kadai masala, chopped coriander leaves.Serve this with chapatti, and rice.

name: Chicken 2 peppers
desc: Chicken 2 Peppers is commonly known as Murg Do Mirch which is a dry fry preparation adding two variety of spices to offer their heat into the dish. The mix of green chilies and black pepper powder are the two main ingredients that lends this heat into the chicken, coated well with other flavoring ingredients like ginger garlic paste and fresh coriander leaves.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan, add chicken pieces (chicken marinated overnight with salt and lemon juice) and cook it for 5 to 7 minutes.
Take it to a plate and keep it aside.
Make a coarse paste of garlic, ginger, green chilies, put this in hot oil.
Then add chopped coriander leaves, roast them till raw flavor is gone, add salt, sugar, pepper powder, fried chicken pieces, toss it, switch off the flame.Serve it with roti or rice.

name: Cashew nut Chikki Muffin
desc: Muffins made of cashewnut chikki ( butter frosting made of butter ,sugar and cashew nut) after baking this butter frosting melts in a mouth.kid will like this kind of mufffins mostly.
instructions:
Take coarsely crushed praline/chikki powder, all purpose flour, salt, baking powder, mix it, and keep it aside.
Take a bowl, add butter, sugar powder, egg (add egg mixture little by little) cream it.
Then add all purpose flour and cashew nuts mixture, butter scotch essence and  mix it well, fill the mixture into the muffin moulds,
Add the praline/chikki coarse powder on the top and bake them at 180o C for 15 minutes.

name: Murgh Makhani Indian Butter Chicken
desc: Murgh Makhani, Recipe - This is a simple home version of butter chicken, also known as 'murgh' or 'chicken makhani,' a popular dish in Indian restaurants. This is best served with naan.
instructions:
Add whole garam masala in the muslin cloth and tie it. Heat butter in a pressure cooker and put the garam masala sachet in it.
Add onions, cashew nuts, saute it for 5 minutes, then add ginger garlic paste, cook this until raw flavor is gone.
Add color giving chili or kashmiri red chilly, green chilly, tomatoes, mix it well and put the lid on and let it cook for 15 to 20 minutes in a slow flame (5 to 6 whistles)
Let it cool down, remove the sachet, using strainer drain out the water and put the onion and tomato into the blender and blend them then make a paste and again strain it, after straining all.
Discard the seeds and peels of tomato. Cook the strained paste of tomatoes and onions for 20 minutes then add salt, sugar as required, mix it and add toasted Kasuri methi (crush it with hands) once it comes to boil switch off the flame.
Cool it and store in small containers in refrigeration conditions.
Use this Makhani gravy in many veg and non-veg dishes.
Take chicken breast, cut them into slices.
Take a bowl add chicken slices, add salt, garam masala, all-purpose flour, curd, mix it well and rest it for 30 minutes.
Heat butter in a pan add chicken pieces cook the chicken till it is tender.
Add makhani gravy, put the lid on and let it cook for some time and reduce the flame and add cream, mix it and switch off the flame.

name: Pepper Rings Egg Makhani
desc: Pepper Rings Egg Makhni. This is a unique and interesting combination of bell pepper and egg.
instructions:
Add whole garam masala (cardamom, cloves, cinnamon stick, bay leaf) in the muslin cloth and tie it.
Heat butter in a pan,  put the garam masala sachet in it, add finely chopped onions, cashew nuts, saute it for 5 minutes, then add salt,  ginger garlic paste, cook this till raw flavor is gone
Add color giving chili or kashmiri red chilies, green chilies, tomatoes, mix it well and let it cook with closed lid for about 15 to 20 minutes on the slow flame (5 to 6 whistles).
Let it cool down, remove the sachet using a strainer, drain out the water and put the onion and tomato into the blender and make a fine paste, later strain it again, after straining all, discard the seeds and peels of tomato.
Cook the strained paste of tomatoes and onions for 20 minutes then add salt, sugar as required, mix it and add toasted kasoori methi (crush it with hands), once it comes to boil, switch off the flame.
Cool it and store in small containers in refrigeration conditions. Use this makhani gravy in many veg and non-veg dishes.
Heat 2 tablespoon butter in another pan, when once butter melts, add bell pepper rings.
Take a bowl, add eggs, green chilies, tomatoes, bell pepper, chopped onion, chopped mint leaves, coriander leaves, salt, mix this well.
Then pour the egg mixture into the rings of bell peppers and add the earlier prepared makhani gravy into the pan and let it cook with closed lid for some time.
After about 5 minutes, add cream to it, mix well and serve this hot.

name: HARA BHARA KABAB
desc: The crispy hara bhara kabab is a vegetarian kabab is full of aromatic spices, made from spinach, green peas and potatoes it is nutritious snack, great with any chutney or sauce.
instructions: 1. Peel and grate boiled potatoes.2. Mash boiled green peas.3. Squeeze out excess water of Blanched spinach and finely chopped.4. Take a pan add oil, whole garam masala, cloves, cinnamon, shahi jeera, red chilli, chopped coriander, and chana dal, after some time add Chopped ginger garlic, and green chillies, 5. Then add chopped onion, steam part of mint and coriander leaves.6. Add green peas, mint, coriander, boiled spinach, and some grated paneer, boiled potatoes, and add salt as per taste, mix it well.7. Take a mixing bowl add bread crumbs,Chat masala, roasted chana dal.8. Rest of the seasoning and it required use the blender to combine the ingredients. 9. Divide the mixture into equal portions. shape them into a ball and then press it in between your palms to flatten it. These are now called tikkis. Dust it with a little roasted chana dal , chat masala, and mix it and make into equal portion 10. Heat oil in a pan add the tikkis and shallow fry them.11. Serve hot with pickle or yogurt chutney.

name: Shahi Paneer Kofta Curry
desc: This Sahi paneer kofta curry is yet another classic Punjabi food recipe of North Indian cuisine.
instructions:
In a bowl add grated paneer, salt, pepper powder, cardamom powder, All-purpose flour and mix it well like a soft dough and make them into balls.
In another bowl add khoya, Pistachio, raisins, almonds and mix it like a dough, then make them into small balls.
Now stuff the khoya balls into paneer balls and then make them into koftas.
Deep fry the koftas till they get a nice golden color.For the gravy: Heat oil in a pan, add chopped onions, salt and cook they are golden in color.
Add ginger garlic paste, green chili paste, red chili powder, nutmeg powder and by adding some water cook it for a minute.Now add yogurt, khoya, cashew nut paste, tomato puree, and mix, then by adding water cook the gravy for 20 minutes on low flame, add a pinch of sugar, cream and mix well.
 
Finally, add fried koftas and Serve this with naan, paratha, romali roti.

name: Fat Free Butter Chicken - Be Fit Be Cool AAPI
desc: Low-fat butter chicken that the whole family will be delighted to cherish.
instructions:
In a pan boil some water, to that add ginger garlic paste, chopped onions, chopped tomatoes, green chilies, cashew nuts, red chili powder, coriander powder, raisins, yogurt, salt and by adding some water cook for 15minutes on a low flame by closing the lid,  and make a paste of it.
In another pan heat water to that add chicken pieces, garam masala, salt and cook for 4-5 minutes by closing the lid, to this add tomato paste and cook for another 10 minutes.
Finally, add Kasuri methi, and you can serve with any kind of pulkas.

name: Healthy  Corn Chat - Be Fit Be Cool AAPI
desc: Low fat Corn chat is a healthy way of enjoying the spicy and tangy Corn chat.
instructions: 1. In bowl add corn seeds, chopped onions, chopped tomatoes, chopped cucumber, boiled pea nuts, chopped coriander leaves, chopped green chilies, mint chutney, chat masala, chopped dates , lime juice and mix well 2. Finally add bread slices which have been roasted on a tawa mix well and serve.

name: Fat Free Sambhar - Be Fit Be Cool - AAPI
desc: This is a healthy Sambhar is made with minimal oil and loads of vegetables. You can   enjoy the dish with Idly or rice.
instructions:
1.In a hot pan add red chilies, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, when they crackle fenugreek seeds, curry leaves, asafoetida, chopped onions and turmeric powder and mix it cook for few minutes.
2.Now add water, green chilies, salt, drumstick, carrot, pumpkin, egg plant, radish, cauliflower, tomatoes, sambar powder, freshly grated coconut and by putting the lid on cook for 7-8 minutes.
3.Add tamarind juice, and cook for 2 minutes.
4.Now add boiled split red gram dal mix and cook for another 2 minutes
5.Finally add chopped coriander and serve hot with rice and papad.

name: Murg Malai Kabab Recipe with Philips Airfryer by VahChef
desc: Murg Malai Kabab, truly a luscious lip-smacking smooth creamy chicken kababs mildly flavored with cheese, herbs & spices, yogurt and air fried to perfection.
instructions:
In a food processor, add the grated cheese, hung yogurt, green chili paste, white pepper powder, coriander powder, garam masala and very little salt and cream the mixture until soft.
Remove the cheese mixture from a bowl and add the chicken pieces, mix the chicken pieces with the cheese mixture and coat the pieces well.
Rest this for about 3-4 hours.
Take chicken pieces and put them on the skewers.
Preheat the Phillips Air fryer to 200 degrees C for 5 minutes.
Remove the basket and place the skewers in the basket and cook for about 7-8 minutes.
After 5 minutes, pull out the basket and turn the skewers and again cook for 3 minutes.Serve hot with mint chutney.
For mint chutney:In the blender, add some mint leaves, coriander leaves, few ice cubes, green chilies, little chaat masala, salt and lime juice.
Blend well to make a smooth paste, serve in a bowl.

name: Jowar Roti Kichidi
desc: A tasty kichidi made with healthy jowar, this one-dish meal is also quite exotic due to the choice of veggies used in it. Moong dal and lentils makes the jowar kichidi rich in protein.
instructions:
Soak the lentils and moong dal for 1 hour.
In a hot pan add ghee, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, red chillies, ginger, onions, green chillies, curry leaves and saute it.
Take mortar & pestle add pepper and crush it.
Then add this crushed mixture into the pan and add salt to it.
Add turmeric powder and saute it.
Now add soaked moong dal, soaked lentils and mix it nicely.
Then add water to it and leave it.
Take jowar roti's and cut into small pieces.
Add these pieces into the cooking pan and add water to it.
Cover it with the lid.
Cook it for 10minutes in a low flame till it is done.
After 10 minutes switch off the flame and transfer into a serving bowl.Now jowar roti kichidi is ready.

name: TANGY MANGO AND DRUMSTICK CURRY
desc: Tangy mango and drumstick curry is a combined flavors of drumsticks and mangoes. This is specially made in summer season.
instructions:
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan and add dry red chillies, ginger, garlic, little salt, raw mango saute it and transfer it into a blender and blend it smoothly.
Heat oil in the same pan and add mustard seeds, curry leaves, drum sticks, turmeric powder, salt and saute it and cover it with the lid and cook it for 2 minutes.
Add water, coriander powder and mix thoroughly place the lid and cook it for 3 -5 minutes.
When drumsticks are 50% cooked add raw mango paste and mix thoroughly and place the lid and cook it for 5 minutes on slow flame.Now check for seasoning and serve it with rice.

name: Homemade Burrito Tortillas
desc: There is nothing like a soft, warm, homemade flour tortilla fresh from the oven. Once you wrap one up into a burrito, it may be difficult to go back to the store-bought variety.
instructions:
Take a bowl add whole wheat flour, all purpose flour, baking powder, salt, melted butter, and hot water, make nice dough.
Divide the dough in equal portions, and using with rolling pin make Tortillas with the help of flour. And cook it both sides.

name: CUCUMBER AND LEMON TADKA DAL
desc: serve dal fry hot with parathas, rotis, jeera rice or plain steamed basmati rice accompanied with onion-tomato raita, papad.
instructions:
1.First take the Cucumber and cut into a small pieces.
2.Then add a pinch of salt and lemon juice and mix it well and put aside.
3.Take a pan add oil, mustard seeds,dry red chillies,cumin seeds,
  chopped garlic,chopped onions,pinch of turmeric and mix it nicely.
4.Then add a pinch of hing,curry leaves and chopped green chillies
  then add chopped Cucumber pieces.
5.Add salt as per taste and a little bit of water.
6.Saute all these nicely for 2 mins.
7.Then add 1tbsp of butter,then add boiled toor dal.
8.Put on lid and saute it nicely for 3 mins.
9.Then sprinkle the coriander leaves and serve in a bowl with Rice.

name: CARROT POTATO AND TARO ROOT INDO CHINESE MASALA FRY
desc: Carrot Potato and Tanroot Ind Chinese Masala Fry, Making:Take a bowl and add potato, carrot, onion and boiled Colacasia.Add maida, corn flour and veniger
instructions:
1.Take a bowl and add potato, carrot, onion and boiled Colacasia.
2.Add maida, corn flour and veniger toss it well.
3.Take a pan, add oil and fry the potato.
4.And keep in a seperate plate.
5.Then fry the colacasia and carrot and keep in the same plate.
6.Now chop the capsicum and onion fry it.
7.In a pan, add oil, chopped ginger, chopped garlic, chopped onion, 
  curry leaves, dry coconut powder, salt (as per taste) and cook it well.
8.Then add tomato ketch up, soya sauce, coriander powder, 
  cumin powder, garam masala, pepper powder mix it well.
9.Add salt(as per taste).
10.Now add fried ingredients and toss it.
11.Switch Off the stove and add chopped green chillies.
12.Serve in a plate.

name: Prawns Head Pakodi
desc: Prawns head pakodi is a easy to make delicious recipe which can be served as an evening snack. one such dish made in a jiffy with very few ingredients.
instructions:
Prepare a thick batter of chickpea flour, rice flour, baking soda, oil (1 teaspoon), salt, ajwain, red chili powder, ginger garlic paste.
Deep fry prawn heads by dipping them in the prepared batter.
Use same oil to fry chopped onion, green chilies, curry leaves, transfer to plate add red chili powder, salt, lemon juice and mix well.
Also transfer fried prawn heads to the above plate. Crispy and yummy Prawns Head Pakodi is now ready to serve.

name: Fish Mango Pulusu
desc: The famous traditional Andhra fish curry, Mamidi chepala pulusu is a tangy delicacy which tastes exceptionally good.
instructions:
Boil raw mango, mash it to perfect juicy consistency and keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, fenugreek seeds, chopped onions, curry leaves and sauté it till onions turn slightly transparent.
Then cook by adding turmeric powder, chili powder, coriander powder, along with salt & water.
When boiled, add the prepared mango pulp, fish pieces and cook it without distrubing the gravy, then add coconut milk and cook for another 10 minutes.
At last, garnish with chopped coriander leaves.Delicious Fish Mango Pulusu is now ready to serve.

name: Sarson Ka Sag
desc: sarson ka saag typically Punjabi (North Indian) dish tastes really nice with Makki Ki Roti (Indian maize flatbread) and a dollop of fresh butter. sarson ka saag is luscious green gravy from the Punjabi cuisine.
instructions: 1. Wash and clean mustard greens and spinach2. Cut finely and put into a pan with a cup of water and boil and blend to a fine paste 3. heat ghee add onions and Cook over a very slow fire till done . 4 .add ginger garlic paste, add corn flour and the paste of greens , gr chilli cooke well and finish of with garam masala5. Serve hot with makki ki roti .

name: DAHI VADA
desc: Dahi vada (lentil dumplings) is a popular Indian chaat, prepared by soaking vadas in thick dahi. The hot deep fried vadas are first soaked in water and then transferred to thick beaten yogurt. These are great as a side dish for a formal dinners. lentil dumpling in yogurt sauce.
instructions:
For vada - Clean, wash and soak the daal overnight.
Grind it into smooth paste.
Add salt to taste.
Heat oil in a pan and drop a spoonfuls of batter and fry till golden brown as shown.
Take the hot vadas and put in cold water for 2-3 minutes.
Now Take them out of water and squeeze the water and keep aside.
For Dahi -add cumin , gr chilli,coriander leaves
blend and add to yougurt and season
Serving - In a deep dish arrange wada and pour dahi over them.
Garnish with tempering as shown
Serve the dahi vadas chilled.

name: KANDHA VADI
desc: A typical Rajasthani vegetarian dish made with moong dal vadis cooked along with spring onion and spices giving an exceptional taste and flavour. Goes well with rice or roti.
instructions: 1. Add very little oil in a pan and when it is slightly hot, add the moong dal vadis and cook it for a while as it gives a nice flavour. Once they slightly get fried, remove and transfer them into a plate. Add little oil in the same pan, when the oil gets hot,2. add mustard seeds. When they start crackling, add cumin seeds, pinch of hing, chopped spring onions. Saut the entire ingredients well. 3. Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder and salt. Mix and add ¢ cup of water and allow the kandha to cook. Check the seasoning and adjust. Bring it to one boil and add the fried moong dal vadis and mix. 4. Reduce the heat, cover the pan with a lid and cook it for about 2-3 minutes. After 3-4 minutes, check and if the moong dal vadis become soft and break easily, then the dish is ready to serve.5. Switch off the flame, cover and serve after 3-4 minutes.

name: Cuts of Vegetables
desc: learn various cuts of vegetablesThe vegetable cut selected for a particular dish must complement the dish it is being used for. For example, sambar we require larger pieces than small pieces. Many other loose descriptions exist i.e. strips, bite-size.
instructions: Cuts vegetables into slices, cubes, lengths...etc

name: GOND KE LADOO
desc: Dond ke ladoo, a popular sweet preparation from the Rajasthani cuisine made with urad dal flour, crushed gond, sweetened and cooked in a good amount of ghee and made into roundels.
instructions:
Take urad dal powder, add ghee, milk, and mix it well, and strain this mixture well, put this powder into the hot ghee and cook for some time in a slow flame (45 minutes).
Take another pan add sugar, water, to make a syrup, Pour this syrup into the flour mixture and mix it well, let it cool for this mixture.
Heat ghee and fry the gond and keep it aside, and crush the some of the fried gond and add into the mixture and mix it well.
When mixture is cool down add nuts and make ladoo.

name: Vagareli Kichidi
desc: Vaghareli Khichdi or Seasoned Khichdi is variant of Gujarati Khichdi. It is delicious and simple daily meal in Gujarat.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan add cumin seeds, cinnamon sticks, cloves, curry leaves, add rice and toor daal, salt, turmeric powder, red chilly powder mix all of this, add water cook this till it gets kichidi consistency, after cooking, kichidi is ready.

name: MANGO CREPES
desc: This is a very quick recipe for your breakfast making a pancake and pouring mango have pulp on top and have it.
instructions:
Take a bowl break the egg and whisk it, add sugar, salt, vanilla essence, baking powder, and add flour, milk, beat the mixture until smooth.
Take pan heat butter once the butter melts add sugar, pulp of mangoes, and cook for some time, add cardamom powder and mango slices, cook for 2 minutes.
Switch off the flame and keep it aside. Take a nonstick pan apply butter pour the crepes mixture into the pan.
Cook it on a medium heat, in this pour the mango mixture and fold it, and take it into the plate.

name: Lamb With Indian Corn
desc: This curry is also called makai ka soweta its a tipical rajastani dish made with lamb and sweet corn it is one of excellent combination which can have it with rice and any roti.
instructions:
Heat ghee in a pan, add whole garam masala spices (cinnamon stick, black cardamom, cloves, cardamom, bay leaf), shahi jeera, cumin seeds, bay leaves, crushed coriander, sliced onions, salt and cook onions are golden in colour,
Then add mace, turmeric powder, ginger garlic paste, coriander powder, red chili paste and switch off the flame.
To it, even add mutton pieces, garam masala powder, beaten curd, and mix it well. Later add crushed corn (grinded in a blender) and mix it well. Lets rest it for 2 hours.
After 2 hours, cook meat till nice and tender, when mutton is cooked add nutmeg powder, chopped coriander leaves.Serve this hot with rice, chapattis, and naan.

name: Healthy Mixed Fruit Chat - Be Fit  Be Cool AAPI
desc: Healthily mixed fruit chat is a low-fat fruit chat is a healthy way of enjoying the spicy and tangy fruit chat.
instructions:
In a bowl add water melon Chopped, papaya pieces, apple pieces, pine apple slices, grapes, pomegranate seeds, finely chopped mint leaves, chat masala, lime juice.
Heat the pan add cumin seeds, fennel seeds and slightly roast them, then crush them in a motor pestle and put on the top of fruit chat mix well and serve.

name: Fat Free Aloo Gobi Matar - Be Fit Be Cool AAPI
desc: Potatoes cauliflower green peas curry with tomato gravy with minimal oil is used. Serve hot with some chapatis or naan or even steamed rice.
instructions:
In a hot pan, add mustard seeds and cumin seeds when they splutter add chopped onions and by adding salt cook till they appear slightly golden in color.
Add turmeric powder and cook for a minute and then add ginger garlic paste cook till the raw flavor is gone.
Now add water, coriander powder, chili powder, chopped tomatoes then put the lid on and cook for few minutes.
Add cauliflower pieces, green peas, and boiled potatoes. By adding enough of water, cook for 6-7 minutes by closing the lid.
Finally add garam masala, Kasuri methi, and chopped coriander and serve hot.

name: Fat Free  Paneer Wrap - Be Fit Be Cool - AAPI
desc: The tongue tickling spicy masala of paneer wrapped in chapati or paratha is a treat to taste buds at anytime.
instructions:
1.Take a mixing bowl, add wheat flour, salt and add some water make a soft dough and rest it for few minutes.
2.Take bowl add vinegar, pepper, salt, ripened red chilly slices and Honey mix it well.
3.Take a mixing bowl add Paneer (cut them into pieces and crush it ), tomato slices, cabbage, basil, slices of green apple, cucumber slices, cheese and mix it well and pour the vinegar mixture and again mix it well.
4.Take the dough and roll it like a sheet and cook the roti on the tawa.
5.Place the mixture on the roti and fold it and cut into two pieces and serve it.

name: Gunpowder Adai
desc: Gunpowder Adai is an exceptional south Indian crispy crepe/ pancake sprayed over with gunpowder which is an amalgamation of flavors made with types of roasted lentil ground to grainy crunch and has a satisfying nutty flavor and the tinge of hing (asafoetida) has got an indefinably extra-savory dimension. A very rich nutritious and healthy breakfast snack good especially for kids and all.
instructions:
In a bowl put in the rice, chana dal, toor dal, dry red chilies and curry leaves. Add water, wash the ingredients nicely once and drain off the water.
Put in the asafoetida, salt and add fresh water till all the lentils are cooked properly (do not put excess water) and rest aside for at least for 3-4 hrs.
Grind them in a blender to a coarse paste. Take a flat non-stick pan and pour 1 spatula batter in the pan and spread evenly from inside out.
Make a small hole in the center and drizzle some oil at the edges of the adai and to the center. Cook it on medium flame.
Sprinkle some good amount of gun powder over the Adai and spread evenly all over the adai.
Cover with a lid and allow it to steam cook for few minutes. Brown it on one side and then flip over to the other side for a minute.Serve hot with coconut chutney or pickle.

name: Spring Onion Adai
desc: Spring onion Adai is a flavourful adai, nutritious, healthy, with a good amount of protein and carbohydrate. Adai made with rice, channa dal and tur dal makes the dosa crisp and adds a lot of flavour to the adai. Spring onion is very versatile green veggies that has a nice crunch and zing which intenses the flavours of the adai.
instructions:
In a bowl, put in the rice, chana dal, toor dal, dry red chilies and curry leaves.
Add water, wash the ingredients nicely once and drain off the water. Put in the asafoetida, salt and water till all the lentils are soaked properly and rest aside for at least for 3-4 hours.
Drain the water and grind them in a blender to a coarse paste.
Add finely chopped spring onions to this coarse batter and mix well.
Take a flat non stick pan and pour 1 spatula batter in the pan and spread evenly from inside out, put holes on adai as required. Drizzle some oil at the edges of the adai and to the center. Cook it on medium flame. Cover with a lid and allow it to steam cook for few minutes.
Brown it on one side and then flip over to the other side for a minute.
Fold and serve hot with coconut chutney or pickle.

name: Drumstick leaf Adai
desc: Drumstick leaves Adai is popularly known as Murungai Keerai Adai in southern India. It is an exceptional crepe made from the combination of at least two lentils and rice; drumstick leaves added in the batter and cooked to perfection makes this dish remarkably nutritious. Traditionally this is a tiffin dish usually had for breakfast. This variation of adai taste good when you use a little extra oil and cook it on low flame. The fresh ground coconut gives a nice crunch when you bite into the adai. Drumstick leaves are rich in iron compared to other greens. This adai goes well with sambar, chutney etc.
instructions:
In a bowl put in the rice, chana dal, toor dal, dry red chilies and curry leaves. Add water, wash the ingredients nicely once and drain off the water.
Put in the asafoetida, salt, and water till all the lentils are soaked properly and rest aside for at least for 3-4 hrs.
Drain the water and grind them in a blender to a coarse paste.
The batter needs no fermentation. Add finely chopped drumstick leaves, grated fresh coconut to this coarse batter and mix well.
Take a flat nonstick pan and pour 1 spatula batter in the pan and spread evenly from inside out with your fingers.
Drizzle some oil at the edges of the adai and in the center. Cook it on medium flame.
Cover with a lid and allow it to steam cook for few minutes.
Brown it on one side and then flip over to the other side for a minute.Serve hot with sambar, coconut chutney, jaggery or pickle.

name: Bottle gourd Soya Nuggets
desc: Bottle gourd Soya Nuggets are very healthy and nutritious snack that can be served as party nibbles. Made with a combo of soya nuggets mixed with grated bottle gourd and boiled potatoes, added with few aromatic spices and herbs makes this a great recipe to treat your kids with good food. This well air fried, oil-free nuggets are absolutely crisp from the outside and soft inside.
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add soya granula (soaked in water for a while and then drain off the water), grated bottle gourd (lauki), boiled and grated potato, green chillies, onions, coriander leaves, mint leaves, turmeric powder, chili powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala and salt to taste.
Add little bread crumb if you feel the mixture is too moist.
Mix all the ingredients well and Shape them into nugget size.
Make a thin batter with all-purpose flour and water.
Dip the nuggets in the flour batter and then roll over the bread crumbs coating them well and keep aside.
Preheat the Philips air fryer at 180 degrees for 3 minutes.
Drop the nuggets in the tray and air fry first for about 3-4 minutes at 180 degrees C.
Remove and blast them with very little oil and again re-fry for another 2-3 minutes.
Remove and serve them hot with any sauce of your choice.

name: Sesame Crusted Baby Corn
desc: Sesame crusted Baby Corn is an excellent finger snack made with baby corns that are inserted in skewers coated with spicy, sweet and tangy sauce, rolled over sesame seeds, then air fried for just few minutes to give a pleasant texture and taste to the sticks.
instructions:
Soak about 6 to 8 wooden skewers in water for a while and remove.
Insert wooden skewers into each baby corn and keep aside.
In a mixing bowl, add red chili paste, soya sauce, star anise powder, green chili paste, ginger, garlic, green chilies, coriander leaves, MSG, pinch of salt, tomato ketchup, corn starch and combine all ingredients well together to make a nice sauce.
Take the baby corn stick and coat it well with the masala mix and then roll it on the sesame seeds.
Repeat the same with all the baby corn sticks and keep aside.
Preheat the Philips Airfryer at 180 degree centigrade for 3 minutes.
Open the basket and place the baby corn sticks inside, close and air fry for 6 minutes at 180 degree centigrade. Remove and serve hot with any favourite sauce of your choice.

name: Air Fried Mini Calzone
desc: Calzones are amazing miniature or mini folded pizzas stuffed with the goodness of some appetizing, nutritious and yummy pizza sauce, veggies, cottage cheese (paneer) and cheese that are brilliantly air fried in the Philips Air fryer giving them the perfect shape, texture, and crispness to eat.
instructions:
Preheat the air fryer at 200 degrees C.
In a bowl add water, yeast, sugar, salt and mix well.
In another bowl, add flour and mix the yeast mixture in the flour and make a smooth dough. Cover and rest it for some time.
For making the pizza sauce: In a pan, add onions when it becomes hot, add garlic, tomato, tomato puree, salt, paprika powder, pepper powder, oregano, parsley and cook for about 3 to 4 minutes.The pizza sauce is ready.
In a bowl add American corn, chopped green bell pepper, chopped tomato and paneer, tomato sauce, 1/4 cup cheese and mix it.
Dust the flour then take a ball of dough and roll it with help of rolling pin. Cut the dough with help of round cutter.
Stuff the mixture only on one side on top add cheese and overlap it. Seal it with little water.
Take a tooth pick and make small holes so that the steam can escape.
Pour little oil on the top and then place them in the air fryer and cook at 200 degrees C for 7 minutes.

name: Air Fried Kadboli / Chegodilu
desc: Kadboli, typically is a mixture of rice flour, salt, ajwain, cumin seeds, chilli powder, turmeric powder, all mixed together, and rolled into rings and air-fried until done and crisp.
instructions:
Preheat the air fryer at 180 degrees centigrade for 3 minutes. 
Take a pan, add water, salt, chilli powder, ajwain, cumin seeds, asafoetida and little oil and allow the water to boil.
When it comes to boil, add rice flour little by little and mix well. Avoid lumps and make into round shape.
Take the mixer and shape it as shown.
Put them in the air fryer and cook at 180 degrees C for 6 minutes.

name: Bhakarwadi  Air Fryer
desc: Bhakarwadi is a traditional sweet and spicy tea-time snack said to have originated from the Maharashtrian cuisine. This snack is a flour based round disc shaped stuffed with a mix of poppy seeds, grated coconut, sesame seeds, coriander and cumin seeds, black pepper corns, hing, fennel seeds and little sugar all mixed together, powdered and rolled similar to a Swiss roll and cut into tiny spiral disc and then finally deep fried to a crispy finish.
instructions:
In a bowl, add besan flour, whole wheat flour, a pinch of hing, turmeric powder, chilli powder, salt, little oil and crumble all ingredients together to get a nice crispy texture and keep aside.
To prepare the masala: In the blender, add fennel seeds, pepper corns, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, amchur powder, hing, sesame seeds, poppy seeds, a pinch of turmeric, chilli powder, desiccated coconut, sugar and salt. Make this to a fine powder.
Take the dough mixture and add the spice mix powder and mix well to make a stiff dough.
Take some dough and with help of rolling pin roll the dough. Sprinkle some spice mixture and roll again.
Cut the flat round dough with help of knife and air fry at 160 degrees for 7 minutes.

name: Crispy Chinese Bhel
desc: Crispy Chinese Bhel is an excellent and awesome snack to treat our palate with healthy and nutritious yet very delectable appetizing food. This snack is a tantalizing mix of fried noodles, colorful bell peppers and some sweet and tangy sauces mixed together, drizzled with some sesame seeds and sprinkled with little vinegar to make it zesty to eat.
instructions:
Preheat the air fryer at 200 degree centigrade.
First boil the noodles and cool it down.
Sprinkle some corn starch over the cooked noodles and toss well.
After its preheated, put the noodles in the air fryer at 200 degree centigrade for 6 minutes.
After around 4-5 minutes, toss the noodles and close the lid to fry again. When 7 minutes are over, take them outside and cool them.
In a bowl, add juliennes of red, green and yellow bell peppers and onions.
Add green chili sauce, tomato ketchup, red chili sauce, vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, chopped spring onion, roasted sesame seeds, mix well and drizzle over the crispy noodles and toss well.

name: Crispy Fried Modak
desc: Crispy Fried Modak is an awesome sweet dumpling stuffed with a sweet filling made of an amalgamation of coconut, cashew nuts, almonds, poppy seeds, sweetened with jaggery and pleasantly flavored with cardamom powder. The outer casing is made of a mix of semolina (suji), wheat flour, maida and dash of salt mixed with ghee that gives a nice crispy texture when air fried.
instructions:
Preheat the air fryer at 180 degrees C.
Take an induction pan and add grated coconut and dry fry it. Add broken cashew nuts, almonds, poppy seeds, jaggery, and cardamom powder. Mix well and keep aside.
To make the dough, take semolina, add some water, ghee, wheat flour, maida, salt, and mix to make a dough.
Roll the dough into a big sheet with help of a rolling pin.
Cut the dough into roundels with help of cutter.
Add stuffing in each of the roundels and seal it like a modak.
Put them in the air fryer and cook at 180 degrees C for 7 to 8 minutes.

name: Maddur Vada - Air Fryer
desc: Maddur vada is a type of onion vadai but unique in taste. This vada is made of all-purpose flour, rice flour and semolina which are mixed together with a spoon of ghee and added with some finely chopped onions, spiced with green chillies, flavoured with ginger, curry leaves, coriander leaves and hing. All ingredients are mixed well to make a stiff dough. A small amount of dough is taken, made into the shape of a patty and fried in the air fryer until golden in colour.
instructions:
Preheat the air fryer at 160 degrees C for 7 to 8 minutes.
Take a bowl and add rice flour, maida, semolina, ghee and crumb it.
In the same bowl, add chopped green chilies, coriander leaves, curry leaves, chili flakes, fresh coconut, ginger, onions and mix all the ingredients.
Adding little by little water, mix to make a stiff dough.
Make this into small balls and shape as Maddur Wada.
Air fry at 160 degrees C for 7 to 8 minutes.Serve hot with coconut chutney or any pickle.

name: Masala Stuffed Okra - Air Fryer
desc: Masala stuffed Okra or Crispy Masala Bhindi/ Okra is a very appetizing and alluring side-dish to eat that goes well with sambar rice or curd rice. Tender Okras are slit and stuffed with a amalgamation of amazing aromatic spicy and tangy spices, air fried for just for 7 to 8 minutes until cooked and crisp.
instructions: 1.Preheat the air fryer at 180 degree C. 2.Slit the Bhendi (ladys finger) and keep aside. 3.Take a bowl and add turmeric pd, chilli pd, coriander pd, cumin pd, chaat masala, salt, chickpea flour, few drops of oil and lime juice. Mix to make a paste. 4.Stuff this masala inside the okra. 5.Put the stuffed okra in the air fryer and cook at 180 degree C for 7 minutes.

name: Crispy Fried Tomatoes with Pizza Flavor
desc: Crispy fried tomatoes are a dazzling and yummy snack that has a fantastic crispy texture on the outer side and soft and juicy inside. One bite, the tomato explodes chucking out a blend of exotic pizza taste flavors that is truly extraordinaire. Inside is a combination of aroma from the basil, oregano, spiced with little red chili flakes, pepper powder, garlicky flavor and a tinge of zest from vinegar.
instructions:
Preheat the air fryer at 180 degrees C for 4 minutes.
Take a bowl and some crushed garlic, pepper powder, red chili flakes, oregano, basil, vinegar, oil and mix all the ingredient adding a little salt.
Take tomato wedges and coat the mixture with help of a spoon.
Prepare the mixture with flour, egg, bread crumbs in different plates.
Take the coated tomato wedges, dip it in the flour then in egg twice and followed with a coating of bread crumbs.
Put them in the air fryer and cook at 180 degrees C for 2 minutes.
Take them out of the air fryer, coat with oil and again put and cook at 160 degrees C for another 3 minutes.
Sprinkle grated cheese on the top of the wedges.

name: Spicy Crumb Fried Beans
desc: Spicy crumb fried beans is a brilliant way of making spicy batter coated fried beans in an airfryer that gives you a crispy snack to eat.
instructions:
Preheat the air fryer at 180 degree centigrade for 3 minutes.
In a bowl, add flour, chaat masala, garam masala, chilli powder, salt and mix well.
Beat eggs and keep aside and in another plate keep the bread crumbs.
Take tender beans, first coat them with flour and then dip in egg mixture, repeat the same procedure for about 2-3 times and at last coat it with the bread crumbs. Repeat with all the remaining beans.
Put them in the air fryer and cook at 180 degree centigrade for 4 minutes.
Open the air fryer, coat the beans with little oil and again fry for 3 minutes.

name: Mouth Watering Stuffed Mushroom Recipe
desc: Large mushroom caps are filled with a blend of spicy and tangy stuffing mix, adding a unique taste on the bite. The outer tandoori masala coating enhances the taste of the mushroom and lends extra flavor. This awesome air fried stuffed mushroom is truly extraordinaire to taste, highly nutritious and a very healthy snack to start the meal.
instructions:
Preheat the air fryer at 180 degrees C.
Firstly prepare the mushroom stuffing by adding mash potato, chopped coriander leaves, green chillies, pressed green peas, salt, and lemon juice. Mix and keep aside.
For making the tandoori marination for mushrooms, take a bowl and add hung curd, chili powder, chaat masala, kasoori methi, garam masala powder, ginger garlic paste, roasted chana powder, and salt. Mix well to make a thick paste.
Marinate the mushrooms with this mixture.
Fill the potato mixture in the mushroom and then take the tooth pick and insert in the middle.
Before keeping the stuffed mushroom in the air fryer, coat them with little oil and then place the mushroom pieces in the air fryer at 180 degrees C for 6 to 7 minutes.
Remove and serve hot with mint chutney or any sauce of your choice.

name: Aubergine Stuffed Cottage Cheese
desc: Stuffed Eggplant or Aubergine Stuffed Cottage Cheese is an awesome and yummy snack made with eggplant that are cut on one side and scooped off with the inside fleshy vegetable which is mixed with little finely chopped onions, tomatoes, paneer (cottage cheese) and aromatic herbs that infuses the gravy with fantastic flavors which are stuffed into the aubergine and airfield until done.
instructions:
Preheat the air fryer at 180 degrees C.
Take the eggplants and scoop the inside flesh and fry them in the air fryer for 4 to 5 minutes.
In a pan, add onion, chopped garlic, tomatoes, scooped eggplant flesh, pepper, chopped capsicum, dried oregano, cottage cheese, tomato paste, and salt well.
Add salt to taste and chopped coriander leaves.
Take the eggplant and stuff with the above mixture and then cover the top of the eggplant and seal.
Air fry at 180 degrees C for 4 to 5 minutes.

name: Corn Mushroom Rice
desc: A classic combination of mushroom and corn cooked with butter gives out the intense earthy flavor of this particular rice preparation dish.
instructions:
Heat butter in a pan and add sweetcorn. Saute it adding cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves. Saute it for another 2minutes and then add finely chopped green chilies.
Now add mushroom pieces, pepper powder, curry leaves and salt.
Add cooked rice and mix it nicely. Mix it for 1-2 minutes and switch off the flame.
At last add coriander leaves. Serve it with raita.

name: STREET STYLE BHUNA CHICKEN
desc: The dish bhuna chicken is an extension of that process where meat is added to the spices and then cooked in its own juices which result in deep strong flavors but very little sauce.The restaurant bhuna is a well-spiced curry with a thick sauce.
instructions:
In a hot pan add dry red chili, coriander seeds, dry coconut pieces, peppercorns, cardamoms, cinnamon sticks, cloves, star anise dry roast all ingredients and transfer to plate and let it cool down.
