In a blender add all roasted ingredients and make it into a fine powder.
Heat oil in a pan add curry leaves, chopped onions, salt saute it until the onions are golden brown.
Add turmeric powder, fennel powder, cumin powder, ginger garlic paste cook it till ginger garlic raw flavor is gone.
In this add chicken pieces mix it well and cook it for 5 minutes with the lid on.
After 5 minutes add tomato puree cook it for 2 minutes then add prepared masala and mix it well.
Finally, add cashew nuts powder mix it and cook it for 2 minutes then serve it with rice.

name: JOWAR ROTI UPMA
desc: Jowar roti upma is a smart and healthy use of left over sorghum millet breads, made in to tasty upma, best alternative for diabetic persons.
instructions:
In a mixie jar add jowar rotis and make them like a coarse powder.
Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, urad dal, chana dal, curry leaves, ginger and saute them.
Now add onions, green chilies, salt and fry them, now add jowar roti powder, some water, coriander leaves, lemon juice, and cook for 4-5 minutes and serve hot.

name: BOILED YAM FRY
desc: Boiled elephant yam steaks dusted with Indian spices and grilled till crispy.
instructions:
In a pressure cooker add yam pieces, salt, garam masala, coriander powder, lemon juice, red chili powder, ginger, and garlic paste and boil until 4-5 whistles.
Heat Tawa pour some oil, fry the yam pieces till they a brown color and serve.

name: JOWAR ROTI KICHIDI
desc:
this healthy and nutritious pulse and cereal mixed khichdi is made
with left over millet bread cooked and tempered with Indian spices along with 
pulses.
instructions: Heat ghee in pan add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, red chilies, ginger, onions, green chilies and sauté them. Now add curry leaves, crush pepper, salt, turmeric powder, masoor dal, moong dal, water, and boil it. when the boilig water add jowar roti pieces, cover with the lid and cook for 10-15 mins Finally add coriander and serve hot.

name: Amritsari Macchi AirFryer
desc: This mouth watering fried fish prepared with lot of spices is a popular street food of Amritsar.
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add in finely chopped ginger, garlic, green chilies, chili flakes (optional), ajwain seeds, pepper powder, chickpea flour, lemon juice, turmeric powder, salt. Mix well to make a thick batter by using water.
Marinate the fish pieces with little salt and lemon juice and keep aside.
Take the fish pieces and mix them well in the chickpea batter mixture until the pieces are coated well.
Preheat the Airfryer at 180 degree centigrade for 3 minutes.
Take wooden skewer and run them through the fish pieces. Put 2 fish pieces in each skewer, even coat evenly the batter one more time.
Pull the airfryer basket and carefully place the skewers. Air-fry the fish pieces for about another another 7-8 minutes.
After 4 minutes, pull out the basket and brush the pieces with little oil and close. Remove and serve it hot.

name: Coxinha AirFryer
desc: Coxinha is a popular street food snack in Brazil. A savory dough shaped into a drumstick around a creamy chicken salad filling.
instructions:
For the stuffing, take a mixing bowl and Add in the chicken pieces, onions, carrot, garlic, pepper powder, cream, cheese, salt and mix well. 
For the outer casing: In a mixing bowl, add in the flour, pinch of salt and a little oil and combine all ingredients well.
Add little chicken stock and knead to make a slightly stiff dough.
Take a portion of the dough and with help of rolling pin, roll into a thin sheet. With help of a round cutter, cut them into roundels and keep aside.
Put some stuffing in each roundel and bring the edges close and seal the dumpling. Complete the remaining and keep aside.
Beat the eggs and keep aside. Take each dumpling and dip them in the beaten egg mixture, remove and toss them over some bread crumbs. Remove and keep aside.
Brush the coated dumplings with a little oil.
Preheat the Airfryer at 180 degrees C for 3 minutes.
Pull out the basket and drop the dumplings inside and air fry for 7 minutes.
Remove and serve with any mayonnaise based sauce.

name: Kara Sev AirFryer
desc: Kara sev is a popular and easy to make Diwali snack recipe.
instructions:
Combine butter, chickpea flour, rice flour, turmeric powder, ajwain seeds, salt, cooking soda in a mixing bowl. Mix well (short crust pastry method).
Add little by little water and mix to make stiff dough.
Divide the dough into two portions and drop one portion of the dough in the press mould.
Press the mould and cut the strings to required size. Repeat the same with the other portion of the dough.
Preheat the airfryer at 180 degree centigrade for 3-4 minutes.
Open the basket and drop the Kara sev strings in air-fry at 180 degree centigrade for 7-8 more minutes. Remove, cool and serve.

name: Pepper Chilli Prawns AirFryer
desc: Prawn fry is considered to be the signature dish of Kerala. It is very easy and tasty recipe.
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add in the small variety of prawns, beaten egg, green chilies, garlic, pepper powder, red chili paste, cornstarch, all- purpose flour, soya sauce, green chili sauce, sugar, vinegar, salt, and lemon juice.
Combine all ingredients well.
In a plate, put some bread crumbs. Drop the spice coated prawns in the bread crumbs and toss well so that they get coated well.
Dust off excess crumb mixture and shift it to another plate. 
Preheat the Airfryer at 200 degrees C for 3 minutes. 
Open the basket and drop the prawn pieces inside. Air-fry them at 200 degrees C for 3 minutes.
After 3 minutes, open the basket, brush the prawn pieces with little oil and again air fry for another 3 minutes.
Remove and serve hot.

name: Mathri Masala AirFryer
desc: This recipe is a delicious twist to traditional mathri filled with spicy besan.
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add in the all purpose flour, pinch of salt, cumin seeds, ajwain seeds, crushed coriander seeds, chili flakes, pepper powder, and ghee.
Combine all the ingredients and knead to make a stiff dough by adding enough water.
Take a portion of the dough and roll into a big chapatti. With the help of the biscuit cutter, cut into round shape and keep aside.
Preheat the air fryer at 180-degree centigrade for 3 minutes.
Remove the basket, arrange the biscuits on it and air fry at 180-degree centigrade for 4 minutes.
Open the basket, turn the mathris to another side and again air fry for another 4 minutes.
Remove, allow cooling and serving.

name: Nachos AirFryer
desc: Nachos are a Tex Mex dish from northern Mexico. The dish is composed of tortilla chips covered with cheese or cheese-based sauce and is often served as a snack.
instructions:
Add a little water to the fresh sweet corn and grind to a fine paste. 
In a bowl, add all-purpose flour, salt, chili powder, butter and combine the ingredients well. 
Add the sweet corn puree and mix well. Knead to make a stiff dough. Preheat the Airfryer at 180
Preheat the Airfryer at 180 degrees C for 3 minutes.
Dust little flour, take the dough and with help of a rolling pin roll the dough to a thin sheet.
Cut them into desired shapes.
Pull out the basket, drop the nachos in the basket and air-fry for 6- 7 minutes.
Remove and serve with fresh homemade salsa.

name: SUGAR ROTI
desc: This roti makes amazing dessert, can serve it as breakfast or a snack.
instructions:
In a bowl add wheat flour, salt, oil and mix it, then add water and make into a soft dough and knead it well, keep it aside.
Divide the dough into equal portions, roll out each portion by adding dry flour.
Apply a teaspoon of ghee in each roti and spread sugar evenly.
Then fold it like a lachha paratha. Roll out again into a circle by using dry flour.
Heat a tava cook each roti, using ghee till golden brown.Now serve sugar roti

name: DAL PARATHA
desc: Dal Paratha, this is best described as Indian stuffed flatbread. This delicious bread is filled with cooked chana dal and a variety of spices
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan add cumin seeds, finely chopped garlic, green chili, boiled toor dal, salt, cook this until dal mixture is dry. Transfer this
Transfer this to a plate and add chopped coriander and let it cool.
Divide the dough into roundels and roll each round a little flat and place some filling in the centre, close from all the sides. And roll as thin as possible.
Heat tava and fry the paratha using oil on both sides.Serve this with any pickle.

name: LOBIA KI ROTI
desc: Cowpeas, soaked overnight cooked, mashed and made into roti.
instructions:
In a blender add lobia (Soaked and boiled by adding salt) ginger, cumin seeds, green chilli, and make it into a paste.
Transfer this into a bowl and add wheat flour, chopped coriander, then mix it like a chapati dough.
Add some oil and knead it well. Divide the dough into equal portions and roll it like a small chapati by adding dry flour.
Heat tava and cook the chapatis using oil till brown on both sides. Serve hot.

name: BOMBAY RAVA ROTI
desc: These bombay rava roti's are super soft and very tasty, its best served for breakfast or dinner. It makes a delicious combination with pickle and curd.
instructions:
In a blender add sooji rava and make it into a powder.
Heat water in a pan, once it comes to boil add salt, then add grated carrot, sooji powder, mix it well and cook it with closed lid on slow flame.
Transfer this into a bowl and add all purpose flour, mix it well.
Divide the dough into small roundels and dust it in flour and roll into small roti.
Heat tava and cook the small roti's using oil on both sides. Serve this with any chutney.

name: BANANA CRUMBLE WITH CUSTARD
desc: A pure vegetarian and low calorie dessert which smells heavenly and tastes divine. It has a fantastic crumble pie crust spread over with soft and creamy custard topped with slices of bananas, dry fruits, and nuts, glazed with little honey which give a pleasant caramelized shine over the Custard Banana. A pleasant mix of diary product, fruits and nuts to give a fantastic crunch on bite.
instructions:
Firstly to prepare custard boil milk and add sugar in that. Keep on stirring.
Now add custard paste made custard powder and water. Keep mixing it till thickens.
Switch off the flame and in a bowl take bread crumbs, desiccated coconut powder, sugar, vanilla essence and condensed milk.
Mix all the ingredients and transfer it on a aluminium base pie tray and set with your fingers equally.
Now just pour all the custard mixture and arrange it evenly.
After this cut the banana in to pieces and arrange them all to cover the mixture.
Dilute honey and spread it over the banana’s, it prevents the banana from discolouring.
On top add nuts like cashews, almonds, tutty frutty and cherries also.
Add little sugar on top and now just place this in oven for 180 degree centigrade for 30 minutes.
After 30 minutes take them out from oven and serve hot in the evenings.

name: TOFU RICE
desc: This is a simple vegetarian dish together with tofu in just a few minutes. It can be served as a main course as it is, or along with a raita.
instructions:
Heat some oil in a pan, add chopped onion, salt,  saute it till onions are slightly transparent.
Now, add chopped capsicum, potatoes, saute for about a minutes put carrot, turmeric and saute it again till it’s 80% cooked.
Then season it with coriander powder, cumin powder, red chili powder, tofu and mix it properly.
 In the same pan, add boiled rice and mix thoroughly.
Switch off the flame and serve hot in a plate or pack in your kid’s lunch box.

name: EGGPLANT PUNUGULU
desc: It is a very popular crispy starter, which is also served in the breakfast and snacks time with tea or coffee.
instructions:
Cut eggplant into small pieces and add onions, Carom seeds(ajwain), turmeric, coriander powder, ginger garlic paste, red chilly powder, salt, corn flour, soda, water and mix it to make thick and loose batter.
 Now drop into small dumplings in hot oil and deep fry them till they become golden color.
Take them out on tissue paper.

name: SAGO LADDU
desc: A mouth watering sweet recipe which is specially made for fasting as well as during festival days.
instructions:
Take some ghee in a hot pan.
Now add almonds, urad dal and roast it for few minutes on a very slow flame.
Also add cashewnuts and sago, then roast it for few more minutes and switch off the flame.
Once it cools down blend it into a coarse powder and take in a bowl.
Now add powdered sugar, ghee and mix it thoroughly.
Now make small ladoo’s with your hand and enjoy these mouth watering ladoo’s.

name: SWEET POTATO SOUP
desc: Sweet potato soup is a Chinese dessert found in Southern China and Hong Kong. It is very simple and homemade soup which gets creamy texture.
instructions:
Firstly boil sweet potatoes and peel out its skin.
Mash them and keep it aside.
Take oil in a hot pan, then add cinnamon sticks and bay leaf.
Add beans, carrots, cabbage, salt and saute it for 2 minutes.
Now add pepper powder, leeks, sweet potato liquid paste(mixed in water) and let it boil for 2-3 minutes.
Remove the bay leaf and cinnamon sticks from it.
Now switch off the flame and add cream in it.
Mix it and serve hot in a soup bowl.

name: NEELAGIRI ROTI
desc: Neelagiri roti is a green color roti which is very attracting, tasty and healthy with all the greens-pudina, methi and coriander leaves in it.
instructions:
Take some oil in a hot pan and add mint leaves, coriander leaves, methi leaves, green chillies, cumin seeds, and saute it for 2-3 minutes till it becomes nice paste.
Switch off the flame and add salt, then blend it into nice paste and keep it aside.
 Now take wheat flour, blended paste and mix it nicely to make a nice chapati dough.
Add little oil and knead it again.
Make small portions and roll them like roti’s.
 Pan fry them with oil, butter or ghee till it becomes golden color.
Transfer in a plate to serve hot.

name: MANGO DIPPING- SUMMER SALSA
desc: This mango salsa recipe is so easy, it takes just minutes to prepare. Simply toss the ingredients in your food processor, or chop and combine by hand. Either way, this simple mango salsa tastes divine.  Use it as a dip for cooked prawns, or as a topping over grilled fish or chicken
instructions:
In a bowl add cumin seeds and crush it with a pestle.
Add onion, green chilies, mango, salt and crush it again
Add lime juice, coriander leaves and crush it until it becomes sauce consistency.Now the mango dipping is ready to serve with papad.

name: HOMEMADE NOODLES
desc: Homemade noodles are much easier to make than you think and you don't even need a pasta machine.
instructions:
1. Take a bowl and add egg and beat it then add flour and mix it to form a tight dough and keep aside.
2. Roll the dough using rolling pin.
3. Sprinkle flour and fan fold it and cut it into thin or thick slices as shown in the video.
4. Boil water in a pan and add noodles, little salt and cook the noodles and transfer it into the strainer and pour the cold water.
5. Now the homemade noodles are ready.

name: PICKLED VEGETABLES CHINESE STYLE
desc: This Chinese-style pickled vegetables  is a combination of  all different vegetables is the perfect appetizer dish to complement any chinese meal, and so unbelievably easy to make.
instructions:
In a bowl add shallots, cucumber, carrots, little salt and toss it.
In this add red and green chilies and mix it.
After 15 minutes add sugar, rice vinegar and mix it and keep aside for 1 hour.Now the pickled vegetables Chinese style is ready.

name: LAHSUN KI CHUTNEY
desc: Lahsun ke  laal chutney is a spicy hot garlic chutney. Popularly used in chaats like vada pav, chillas etc. A pungent chutney of garlic, spiced up with red chili powder and pepped up with lemon juice. Lahsun ki chutney combines wonderfully with plain and simple dishes.
instructions:
Gring coriander seeds to coarse powder.
In the same blender, add green chillies, garlic, salt, red chili powder, mint leaves, coriander leaves, tomato, sugar, little water and blend it again into a coarse paste.
 Heat oil in a pan and switch off the flame and add coarse paste and mix thoroughly.The lahsun ki chutney is ready to serve with roti or pulka.

name: MOONG DAL KA BHAJIYA
desc: Moong dal ka bhajiya is a snack recipe. When you don't want to have something as heavy as a pav snack, switch to these petite moong dal bhajjis. The crushed peppercorns and coriander seeds give these crisp dumplings their characteristic flavor.
instructions:
Soak the moong dal for 2 hours and remove the water and blend it into a smooth paste.
Take a bowl and add moong dal paste, pepper, salt, asafoetida, red chili powder and mix thoroughly.
Add cooking soda, oil, coriander leaves and mix thoroughly.
Heat oil in a pan, drop it like small balls (bhajiya) using hand and deep fry them.Now the hot and crispy Moong dal ka bhaajiya is ready to serve.

name: MALVANI VADE-KOMBDI VADE
desc: Kombdi Vade is staple food of Malvan which is very popular in west coast in Maharashtra. Very flavorful, crispy and tastes fabulous with chicken curry specially.
instructions:
Take a bowl, add rice flour, salt, turmeric powder, oil, warm water and mix thoroughly like a smooth chapathi dough.
Take small dumpling, place it on the oil applied polythene sheet and cover it with the same sheet and press it with the plate like vade as shown in the video.
Heat oil in pan and deep fry the pressed vade. Now the puffed Kombdi Vade is ready to serve with malvani chicken.

name: MAKKA KA CHA VADA
desc: Makka ka cha Vada is a delicious and mouth watering crispy vada made with sweet corn, boiled potatoes, and spices, deep fried until golden in colour. Excellent appetizer from the Maharashtrian cuisine.
instructions:
Take the blender and add sweet corn and blend it into a coarse paste.
Boil the potato and grate it.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan, add fennel seeds, cumin seeds, garlic, ginger, green chillies and saute it.
Add black salt, cumin powder, coriander powder, amchur powder, turmeric powder, asafoetida, garam masala and saute it.
To it, even add corn, potato, salt, sugar and saute it.
Now add flattened rice, chickpea flour and saute it and switch off the flame.
Sprinkle corn flour and mix thoroughly.
Take small dumpling and make round balls and give the shape of cutlet using hand and place it in a strainer.
Heat oil in a pan and dip the cutlet from strainer and deep fry them until golden brown in colour.Now the makka ka cha vada is ready to serve with the tomato sauce.

name: DOODHI ANNANA AMTI
desc: Doodhi Annana Amti is a very simple preparation made combined with bottle gourd and pineapple. This dish is is specially made for marriage occasions in the thana.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, black cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, bay leaf, curry leaves and saute it.
Add onions, garlic, ginger, green chillies, asafoetida, turmeric powder, red chilly powder, garam masala, coriander powder, goda masala and saute it on slow flame.
To it add bottle gourd pieces, groundnut and saute it and place the lid and cook it.
Then add pineapple pieces, water and mix thoroughly and place the lid and cook it.
Add tomato, jaggery, tamarind juice and saute it.
Now add sesame seeds powder, peanut powder, grated coconut and cook it for 2 -3 minutes on slow flame.
Atlast add coriander leaves and mix thoroughly.Now the doodhi annana amti is ready to serve with roti or rice.

name: GAVRAN MATKI USAL
desc: Matki chi usal - maharashtrian dish presents a spicy and authentic recipe to prepare the popular maharashtrian lentil preparation, usal. The sprouted lentils like matki is cooked with onion, tomato, chillies and coconut and enjoyed with bhakris or rice flour rotis.
instructions:
Heat oil in pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, onion, garlic, ginger, curry leaves and saute it.
On low flame add green chillies, asafoetida, turmeric powder, red chili powder, red chili powder(Maharashtra), moth beans and saute it.
Add water and mix thoroughly and place the lid and cook it for 15 minutes.
Atlast add tomato, coriander leaves and mix thoroughly and cook it. Now the dish is ready to serve with rice.

name: BAJRI CHI BHAKRI-BAJRA ROTI
desc: Bajri chi bhakri - bajra roti made with flour of pearl millet a specialty of Maharashtra. Bajra gives heat to your body so, generally we eat this bhakri in winter season.
instructions:
Take a bowl, add bajra flour, salt, warm water, 1 teaspoon of oil and make a stiff dough.
Apply oil to the polythene sheet, place the small dumpling of the dough and fold the polythene and press it with plate and make the poori size bhakri.
Heat the tawa, place the bhakri and cook it on both sides using ghee.

name: METHI BHAJI
desc: Methi Bhaji prepared with fresh and green methi leaves is one of the simple and healthiest recipes with fenugreek.
instructions:
In a bowl add chick pea flour, asafoetida, carom seeds, green chillies, ginger, garlic paste, cooking soda, turmeric powder, salt, garam masala, onions, methi leaves, spring onions, water and mix thoroughly.
Heat oil in a pan and drop in the bajji using hand and deep fry them until golden brown in colour.Now the hot methi bhaji are ready to serve with tomato sauce.

name: CRISPY CORN PEPPER CASHEW
desc: Crispy corn pepper cashew is an excellent dish which can be served as a snack especially a wonderful and exotic cocktail snack. This snack dish is neatly made with sweet corns and cashew nuts that are coated with a humble spiced batter, deep fried until lightly crisp and tempered with fresh curry leaves and green chillies to give a zest to the dish.
instructions:
1. Take a bowl and add ginger garlic paste, salt, ½ tsp pepper powder, 1tbs corn flour, 1 tbs egg, little water and mix thoroughly.
2. Add corn and mix well and keep aside.
3. Take another bowl and add corn flour, all purpose flour and mix thoroughly and add only corn from the mixture and dust it.
4. Then place in the colander to remove extra flour as shown in the video.
5. In the left over batter add cashew nut and mix thoroughly.
6. Remove the cashew nuts and dust it in the cornflour and all purpose flour mixture.
7. Heat oil in a pan and add corn and place the lid but do not cover completely deep fry corn and remove into a plate.
8. In the same oil add cashew nut and deep fry them and take it into a same plate.
9. Take 2 tbs oil in a pan add onion, crushed ginger and garlic, curry leaves, green chillies, soya sauce,1 tsp finely chopped curry leaves,½ tsp pepper and saute it.
10. Add corn and cashew nut and toss it.
11. Now the crispy corn pepper cashew nut is ready to serve.

name: KUTCHI DABELI
desc: Kutchi dabeli is traditionally sold on the streets of Gujarati towns. It is another version of vada pav made with a sweet and spicy potato mixture.
instructions:
Heat the pan and add coriander seeds, cumin seeds, cloves, cardamom, dry red chilies, star anise, black cumin seeds, cinnamon, javitri and dry roast it then transfer it into a plate, allow it cool.
Transfer it into a blender and make fine powder.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan and add 1 tablespoon above fine powder, dessicated coconut, amchur powder, salt, sugar just mix it and switch off the flame.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan and add roasted ground nuts later switch off the flame.
To it add amchur powder, chaat masala, 1 teaspoon red chili powder, coriander powder and mix it nicely.
Take the mixie jar and add coriander leaves, green chillies, bengal gram, lime juice, salt and blend it into smooth coriander chutney.
Take garlic, salt, 1 tablespoon red chili powder and make a smooth paste with pestle, transfer into a bowl and add little water to make garlic chutney.
Heat oil in a pan and add 2 tablespoon of prepared dabeli masala, boiled mashed potato switch off the flame.
Mix nicely and spread it into a plate sprinkle chopped onions, pomegranate seeds, mixture of ground nuts, 1 tablespoon chopped coriander leaves and keep the stuffing aside.
Slit ladi pav horizontally and spread garlic chutney, coriander chutney, dates and tamarind chutney, potato mixture and fold it.
 Spread butter on the ladi pav and roast it on hot tawa. Now the kutchi dabeli is ready to serve.

name: ADAS POLOW
desc: Adas Polow, a delicious rice layered with lentils. It's a great rice dish to prepare when you don't have a lot of time.  A traditional Iranian rice and lentil polow (pilaf) is cooked with a crusty, delicious layer of rice on the bottom. The saffron-scented rice and lentils are decorated.
instructions:
Heat butter in a pan and add onion, garlic, cinnamon, cumin powder, pepper powder and saute it for a minute.
Add lentils, quinoa, little salt and saute it.
Add hot water, place the lid and cook it for 10 minutes.
Heat butter in another pan and add almonds, walnuts, raisins and saute it for a minute and later add dates, saute it and transfer it into a plate.
Heat 1 tablespoon butter In the same pan add potato slices as one layer.
On top spread half of cooked quinoa as another layer.
On top sprinkle half of roasted dry fruits.
Later spread half of saffron water.
On top spread leftover quinoa, dry fruits, saffron and cook it for 2 minutes with lid on it.Now the quinoa is ready to serve.

name: EGGLESS ZEBRA CAKE
desc: Zebra Cake is a delicious yellow cake with creme filling covered in white icing and trimmed with fudge stripes.
instructions:
Take a bowl and add all purpose flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and mix it properly.
In another bowl add Butter, milk made and whisk it.
To it add milk, vanilla essence, vinegar and whisk it.
Add the flour mixture and mix the batter nicely.
Divide the batter into two half. In one half mix cocoa powder.
Place the butter paper in the baking tray and pour the plain batter and cocoa batter one on the other.
Pre heat the oven for 15 minutes and bake cake at 180 degree for 25 to 35 minutes.
Demould the cake and cut into pieces.Now the eggless zebra cake is ready to serve.

name: CHEESE NACHOS
desc: These nachos are a crunch to make. Layering the chips and cheese ensures that every chip has molten goodness on it.
instructions:
Take a bowl and add maize flour, wheat flour, 1 teaspoon oil, little salt, little water and make the hard dough.
Roll the dough using rolling pin and cut it into diamond shapes.
Take a fork and poke them.
Heat oil in a pan and deep fry the nachos to golden brown in colour, transfer it into paper towel.
Heat butter in a pan and add all purpose flour, saute it.
Add milk, pinch of salt, shiraz cheese, mozzarella cheese and boil it.
Arrange nachos in a plate and sprinkle tomato, onions, sweet corns, bell pepper, then pour melted cheese.Now the yummy cheese nachos are ready to serve.

name: EGGLESS DONUTS
desc: Eggless doughnuts offer a delicious, tempting dessert treat to all sweet lovers who are vegetarians. The freshly baked eggless doughnuts taste awesome.
instructions:
Take a bowl and add all purpose flour, yeast, butter, sugar and mix it.
Add milk and mix thoroughly to make the soft dough, keep aside for 2 hour.
Knead the dough, roll it with rolling pin.
Cut them into donuts and place it on the dusted pan later cover it with clean rap and leave it for 30 - 45 minutes.
Deep fry the donuts to golden brown colour.
Take a bowl and add icing sugar, vanilla essence, milk and mix thoroughly to make thick glazing mixture.
Dip the donuts in the glazing mixture and keep aside.Now the yummy eggless donuts are ready to serve.

name: BANANA BREAD WITH QUINOA
desc: A tasty and moist banana bread made with quinoa for staying power and an added protein boost. It's less than 150 calories per serving.
instructions:
In the mixie jar add banana, butter, palm sugar, coconut milk, baking soda, baking powder, egg, cooked quinoa and blend it.  
Spread the butter to baking tray and transfer the blended mixture.
On top decorate with walnuts.
Bake in the oven for 40 minutes at 180 degree centigrade.
Cut into pieces and now fluffy banana bread is ready to serve.

name: CHICKEN PULAV WITH QUINOA
desc: Quinoa replaces basmati rice in this fragrant. The  chicken pulav with quinoa  is very delicious, flavorful and  packed with protein and nutrients.
instructions:
Take a bowl and add chicken, ginger garlic paste, turmeric powder, garam masala, coriander powder, red chili powder, salt and mix thoroughly later marinate it for some time.
Heat ghee in a pan and add cloves, black cumin seeds, cinnamon, cardamom, bay leaf, green chillies, sliced onions saute it.
Add marinated chicken, mint leaves and cook it on slow flame for 10 minutes by placing the lid.
Add yogurt, mix it and cook it for 5 minutes with a lid on it.
Add quinoa, add sufficient water so that quinoa is just submerged. Then place the lid and cook it for 10 minutes.
After 7 minutes add lime juice, coriander leaves and mix it nicely.Now the chicken pulav with quinoa is ready to serve with raitha.

name: BASIC QUINOA RICE
desc: Quinoa rice is a gluten-free recipes. This protein-packed grain looks a bit like couscous, is as versatile as rice, and tastes delicious on its own.
instructions:
1.Wash quinoa and strain the water.
Take a pan and add water, quinoa , rice and place the lid to cook it for 20 minutes. Now the fluffy basic quinoa rice is ready to serve.

name: QUINOA UPMA
desc: Quinoa upma is very delicious, flavorful and  packed with protein and nutrients. It is a quick and easy recipe that you can put up for breakfast or lunch or dinner in no time. It is perfect for bachelors, vegetarians, vegans looking for healthy protein rich recipes.
instructions:
Heat ghee in a pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, green chillies, curry leaves, onions, ginger and saute it.
Add carrots, little salt and saute it.
Wash the quinoa then soak it for 5 -20 minutes and strain the water.
To the above pan add quinoa, water, salt and mix thoroughly then place the lid and cook it on slow flame for 10 minutes.
Add roasted ground nuts, lime juice, coriander leaves.Now the protein rich quinoa is ready to serve.

name: PITA BREAD WITH FALAFEL HUMMUS
desc: This is taste snack recipe prepared with aroma of that particular pita bread stuffed with falafel. In Arabic the word hummus is used to describe a dish or a dip made of ground chickpeas, tahini (sesame seed paste), lemon juice, and garlic, and often olive oil.
instructions:
Soak the chickpea overnight and boil it.
Then transfer to a blender and grind to a coarsely paste.
Take a bowl, add chopped onion, green bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, red bell pepper, green chillies, coriander leaves, prepared chickpea paste, salt and mix it nicely.
Now, prepare small dumpling and give oval shape with hands.
Heat oil in a pan and deep fry them, later transfer falafel into paper towel.
Take the mixie jar, add dry roasted sesame seeds, garlic, lime juice, little salt blend it once.
To it add 2 tablespoon of oil and blend it again, later add ½ cup boiled chickpea and blend again into smooth hummus paste.
Cut the pita bread into two half so that it open like a pocket.
In each pita pocket, place the chopped lettuce, tomato, onion, falafel, spread hummus.
Then top it again with lime juice, julians of tomato, onion.Now pita bread with falafel hummus is ready to serve.

name: JACK FRUIT SEEDS CURRY
desc: Curry made from ripe jack fruit is not very tasty, but the seeds from ripe jack fruit make a delicious curry that can be served either as a side dish for rice.
instructions:
Roast jack fruit seeds and remove the skin.
Add seeds to boiling water with little salt and boil it until seeds are soft.
Remove seeds and crush it like as shown in video.
Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves, onion, salt and saute it.
To it add turmeric powder, tomatoes, red chili powder, coriander powder and saute it.
Add jackfruit seeds and mix nicely later cook it for 2 minutes.Now the jack fruit seeds curry is ready to serve.

name: FRESH RED CHILI AND DRUMSTICK PICKLE
desc: Drumstick pickle, the pungent flavour of drumstick blends very well with the hot red chillies,  spices, resulting in an aromatic and flavourful pickle. Tastes good with rice or any south indian tiffins like idli, dosa.
instructions:
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan, add fresh red chilies and saute it.
Add fenugreek seeds, 6 of garlic cloves, salt and saute it for a minute.
Transfer it into mixie jar and grind it by adding tamarind, later blend it to a smooth paste.
Heat 3 tablespoons of oil in the same pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, 3 garlic cloves, drumsticks and saute it for 2 minutes till there color is slightly changed.
Then add red chili paste and mix thoroughly, check for seasoning.  Later transfer into jar and keep it aside for 3 days.Now fresh red chili and drumstick pickle is ready to serve.

name: GREEN CHILLI DRUMSTICK PICKLE
desc: Drumstick pickle, the pungent flavour of drumstick blends very well with the spicy green chillies, resulting in an aromatic and flavourful pickle. Tastes good with rice or any south indian tiffins like idli, dosa.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds, curry leaves, drumsticks and saute it.
Green chillies, turmeric powder, asafoetida, coriander powder, fenugreek powder, tamarind juice, jaggery and mix it.
Place the lid and cook it for 15 minutes on slow flame.Now the green chilli drumstick pickle is ready to serve with roti or rice.

name: Drumstick Fry
desc: A simple spicy drumstick fry prepared with fresh drumsticks is a delicious Indian recipe served as a appetiser or side dish.
instructions:
Boil the drumstick piece and keep aside.
Take a plate, add moist drumstick pieces, cornmeal flour, rice flour, turmeric powder, ginger garlic paste, coriander powder, cumin powder, red red chili powder, salt, and mix nicely by using little water so that mixture coats on drumstick pieces.
Heat oil in a pan, add drumstick pieces and shallow fry them.
Later even add curry leavesand let it cook for one more minute.
When drumstick colour changes to brown colour then switch off the flame and transfer into serving plate using tong.Now the drumstick fry is ready to serve.

name: ARATIKAYA NUVULA KARAM
desc: This is Andhra style raw plantain fry coated with spicy homemade sesame powder served as a side dish for rice.
instructions:
Remove peel of plantain and cut into 1 ½ inch length pieces.
Soak the sesame seeds in water for 10-15 minutes and strain the water.
Take a pan and add water, turmeric powder, little salt, tamarind juice, raw plantain and boil with lid on it until plantain are soft.
Heat the pan and add sesame seeds and roast it, transfer into a plate.
In the same pan add coriander seeds, chana dal and dry roast it and transfer into same plate.
Take the mixie jar and add dry roasted ingredients, blend it to coarse powder.
Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves, red chillies, boiled plantain, red chili powder, coarse powder and saute it until plantain is coated with mixture nicely.Now aratikaya nuvvula karam recipe is ready to serve.

name: BOILED BEETROOT SALAD
desc: Boiled beetroot salad is a healthy salad as beetroot contains no fat, very few calories and a great source of fiber.
instructions:
Take a boiled beetroot, peel the skin and cut into diced pieces.
Take a bowl, add hung yogurt, sugar, salt, pepper powder and whisk it.
Then add oil, lime juice and whisk it again.
To it add beetroot, paneer cubes, onions, spring onion and mix it. (Optional: you can also add green chilies)
For serving, take a plate, add lettuce as a base, serve beetroot mixture over it.
Garnish with spring onions green part.Now the Boiled Beetroot Salad is ready to serve.

name: RAJMA AND MUSHROOM BURGER
desc: Choose the rajma and mushroom  burger when you want to ensure a unique menu for your party and it is easy to prepare snack recipe.
instructions:
Boil the kidney beans until it is soft.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan, add garlic, onion and saute it.
Add mushrooms, green chillies, pepper powder, mixed herbs, all purpose flour and saute it.
Switch off the flame, add kidney beans saute it for a minute and transfer into mixie jar, add salt then blend it to make coarse paste.
Make thick round patties with coarse paste.
Heat 2 tablespoon oil in a pan and add patties and shallow fry on both side with slow flame.
Cut the burger bread into two half horizontally and heat it by placing in pan with upside down.
Spread tomato ketchup on half of burger bread and place slices of cucumber, tomato, fried patties, Cheese.
Other half burger bread spread mustard sauce and place it on top of cheese.Now rajma and mushroom burger is ready to serve.

name: PENNE ARRABIATA PASTA
desc: Arrabbiata sauce is in Italian dish, It is simple pasta dish with loads of flavour is a spicy sauce for pasta made from garlic, tomatoes, red chillies, pepper cooked in olive oil.
instructions:
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan and add garlic, onions, little salt, red chili flakes and saute it.
Add dry basil, tomato(seed removed), sugar, tomato puree and cook it for 5 minutes.
To it add vinegar, pepper powder and cook for 2 minutes.
Switch off the flame, now arrabiata sauce is ready.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan and add little garlic, carrots, green bell pepper, cherry tomatoes and saute it.
Add penne pasta, pepper powder, arrabiata sauce and saute it.
To it add pasta boiled water, cream and saute it.
Transfer into serving plate and garnish with coriander leaves, cheese.Now the penne arrabiata pasta is ready to serve.

name: SWEET DUMPLING
desc: This is simple and instant sweet dumpling recipe prepared for festive occasions like Ugadi and Sri rama navami.
instructions:
Take a cup and dissolve jaggery in little water.
Take a bowl, add all purpose flour, cardamom powder, sesame seeds, baking powder,  baking soda (optional) and mix it.
To it, strain jaggery water and mix to get mysore bajji consistency.
Heat oil in a pan, drop in small dumpling with hands and deep fry until golden brown in colour.
At last, transfer into paper towel and dust some powdered sugar.Now sweet dumpling are ready to serve.

name: Bisi Bele Bhath click HD youtube
desc: Think of Karnataka cuisine the first thing which pops into our mind is Bisibele bath. Bisi means hot, bele means dal so bisi bele bath.

name: Chinta Chiguru Mamsam
desc: Chinta chiguru mamsam, a classic dish from the Andhra cuisine.
instructions:
Take pan add oil, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, whole garam masala, chopped onion mix well,then add turmeric powder, ginger garlic paste mix well and cook for few minutes then add coconut powder and cook it for 2 to 3 minutes.
Now  add lamb mix well add little water and salt, coriander powder, chilli powder mix well and cover with the lid and cook till the lamb is tender.
You can also use cooker to cook lamb.once the lamb is cooked then add the coriander leaves, mint leaves, tender tamarind leaves mix well and cook for 5minutes till the lamb is dry.
Once it is dry switch off the flame.

name: Bitter Melon - Karela Fry
desc: Kakarakaya Vepudu is a simple Indian food recipe using bittergourd and spices.
instructions:
Grate the upper layer of bitter melon, cut into thin slices.
Now add a pinch of salt, half teaspoon of turmeric powder and squeeze the excess moisture (juicy content) from bitter melon then transfer to a bowl.
Transfer this juice into serving glass and serve it.Now, preparation of bitter melon fry:Heat oil in a pan, add urad dal, green chilies, curry leaves, sliced onion, ginger garlic paste, turmeric powder, bitter melon, and saute it.
Then season with coriander powder, red chili powder and cook it with closed lid on slow flame for about 4-5 minutes.
In it, add sugar and fry till the bitter melon turns to golden brown in color.
At last, add chopped coriander leaves and serve it with rice or chappati.

name: Yam Fry
desc: Elephant Yam (Chena or Senai Kizhangu) is firstly cut into pieces, boiled and fried with spices until crisp. Elephant Yam slices cooked with Indian Spices.
instructions:
Peel the yam and cut into thin long slices.
Wash them and boil for 5 minutes till they are half cooked.
Take a pan add oil,mustard seeds, cumin seeds, green chillies, curry leaves saute them then add onion cut into thin or you can blend the onions mix it then add salt to it mix well.
Once onion slightly changes it colour add turmeric , ginger garlic paste, poppy seeds powder ( dry roast poppy seeds in a pan and blend it into a fine powder) then add coconut powder, red chilli powder and mix well add little bit of water to it and cook for 5 minutes.
Once masalas are cooked, if the masala is dry add some more water to it and cook for a minute then spread the masala all over the pan and add the boiled yam into it.
Let it cook for 5 minutes and rotate the yam evenly till it changes its colour to golden brown or till the masala sticks to yam.
Finely switch off the flame and add chopped coriander leaves if required lemon juice.

name: Bombay Karachi Halwa
desc: Bombay / Karachi is a popular Indian sweet dish made with cornflour sweetened with sugar, ghee, flavored with cardamom and garnished with nuts. This colorful sweet dish is one epic dish from the ancient Maharaj's time for all kinds of special occasions.
instructions:
In a pan, add sugar, water, lime juice and let sugar dissolve completely.
When sugar comes to boiling point, remove from flame. Keep aside.
Take corn flour bowl, to it add around 100 ml of water and mix to a nice thin batter.
Add 1/2 teaspoon of ghee into a non-stick pan without switching on the flame of stove, then add corn flour mixture and switchon flame by putting to lowest flame possible.
 When it is getting slightly thicken, switch off the flame then add sugar syrup in small quantities and keep mixing it.
After sugar is completely poured to make slightly thicker consistency, switch on flame, then add ghee little by little and keep stirring it.
To it, add pinch of color (of your choice), cardamom powder, when ghee oozes out of the halwa mixture.
At last, add chopped cashew nuts and mix it. switch off the flame.
Let it set for 1 hour by pouring it in serving plate, then cut it into small cubes.
Delicious Bombay  Karachi Halwa is now ready to serve.

name: Navrattan Korma
desc: Navrattan korma is a classic delicious Mughlai dish with veggies incorporated for health benefits.
instructions:
Take a pan add some water bring it to boil and then add cashew nuts, onions chopped cook till this is tender then blend in blender keep aside.
Now in another pan add enough water to boil potatoes, carrot, beans, add salt cook till these vegetables are half cooked then add cauliflower once vegetables are tender remove from the flame and keep it aside.
In a pan add oil Bay leaf, whole garam masala, jeera, ginger garlic paste, then add cashew nut and onion paste mix well then add green chili chopped, coriander powder, and cook till oil oozes out, now you can add little water, bring to boil.
Now add boiled vegetables, fried paneer, dry fruits slightly fried, raisins, pineapple, salt, cream, color, pepper, cook for 10 minutes.Lastly, add pomegranate seeds and coriander leaves chopped.

name: How to Fillet a Fish
desc: Fish fillet are best way to eat bone less of fish
instructions: 1. Cut the fish down the back bone with a sharp kife mark your fillet and cut to look like a filletinsert the knife and will hit then. 2. Bone and with slanted angle and feeling the bone cut the fillet as shownremove the skin as shown for a perfect fillet.

name: Mango lassi
desc: Mango lassi is a refreshing cold Indian beverage consisting of yogurt flavoured with sweetened kesar mango pulp.
instructions:
In a food processor, add mango (cut into small cubes) and blend it with hand blender.
Then add sugar in it and blend it again.
Now, add curd if required, add milk or water blend it and serve it.

name: Peanut and raisin cookie
desc: Peanut and raisin cookie is a delicious baked biscuit made with the flour of dry roasted peanuts.
instructions:
Dry roast peanuts and blend it.
Take a bowl and add dalda, sugar, honey cream it, then add peanut powder mix well.
Now add flour, baking powder, raisins mix well in another bowl add egg beat well and milk mix well.
Now add the egg mixture to peanut and maida mixture make it into a dough.divide into equal dumplings place it oven for 150 degree 15minutes or till golden brown colour.

name: Sweet Semolina Poori
desc: Sweet Semolina Poori is an Indian sweet.
instructions:
Take a pan boil water add semolina mix well once it is half cooked add sugar cardomam powder mix well.
Cook till sweet is done keep a side to cool down.In another bowl take Wheat flour, salt, oil 1teaspoon mix well then make into a dough.
Now take equal quantity of dough and sweet stuff into the dough and make a poori size and deep fry.
Another method take dough of chapati size stuff the sweet and make a chapati and cook both the side on tava.

name: Simple Onion Gravy
desc: The ultimate cosy comfort food made with a rich onion gravy.
instructions:
Take a pan add oil, whole garam masala, onions chopped mix well add salt fry until onions are golden brown color.
Now remove the excess oil, then add turmeric, ginger garlic paste mix well.
Now add coriander powder, red chill powder, green chilies, if required salt, mix well and add water as needed bring it to boil. onion gravy is ready.
To this gravy add methi leaves, marinated chicken and cook until the chicken is done then add chopped coriander leaves.NOTE: To the mariante chicken, add curd, salt and lemon keep aside for 2hours.

name: Bechamel Sauce  White Sauce
desc: Bechamel sauce otherwise known as white sauce is one of the mother sauces of French cuisine.
instructions:
Take a pan add butter once butter melts add maida flour mix well with out forming lumps do not brown this mixture then switch off the flame.
Take half onion stud cloves into onion and bay leaf keep a side.
Take warm milk add little by little to the flour mixture mix with out forming lumps once it is done now switch off the flame keep mixing this mixture till it comes to boil in a very slow flame,add salt,pepper, the onion and bay leaf, cloves boil for 10 minutes, to check the sauce is ready take the spoon just draw a line at the back it should hold to that line.
Once the sauce is ready remove the onion switch off the flame, transfer to another bowl.can use this sauce for pastas.

name: Cucumber Chutney
desc: Dosakaya Pachadi is an easy to make Indian food recipe. A traditional Andhra pachadi.
instructions:
Peel the cucumber remove the seeds and cut into pieces.add to blender cucumber pieces,green chillies, cumin seeds, garlic, tamarind, salt and blend to a coarse paste and transfer in to a bowl.
For tempering add oil, mustard seed, red chilli, urad dal, curry leaves once urad dal is light brown remove and add to the cucumber mixture.serve with hot rice or naan.

name: Amaranth leaves Potato Fry
desc: A mild and sweet flavored stir fry using amaranth leaves and potato. This indeed is a healthy green vegetable combined with potatoes is best to relish nutritious food at your home with family.
instructions:
Chop the amaranth leaves and clean with water. Keep aside.
Heat 3 tablespoons of oil, when heated add dry red chilies, mustard seeds, urad dal. After they splutter, add cumin seeds, chopped garlic, ginger.
Then add finely chopped onions, salt, turmeric powder until slightly golden brown.
In the same pan, add green chilies, boiled and chopped potatoes, saute it.
To it, even add amaranthus leaves, sorrel leaves and fry it on low flame for 4-5 minutes.
This fry is done and is serverd with chapatis and rice with ghee.

name: veg macroni
desc: macroni is a very tasty dish actuay it is an italian dish.
instructions: boil the bambino macrony in water. when it gets boil drain off the water. take one pan. put some oil in it. when the oil gets heated put onion in it when onion gets brown put saly and red chily powder in it put some soya sauce,chily sause,vineger. and put macrony in it. and cook for 4-5 mins. serve it hot -Tanya Kamboj

name: Paneer Egg Rolls
desc: Its An innovative crispy rolls ,paneer egg rolls are made from oats, crumbled paneer, and spice. A fried snack item paneer egg rolls are sure to appeal to all, when served hot with mint and coriander chutney or ketchup.
instructions:
Take a bowl add egg, maida,cornflour,salt,water make into a thin batter keep a side. Now another bowl add paneer, oats, salt, spring onions chopped, chilli pwd mix well keep a side Now take a non stick pan add little oil and wipe of with tissue papper and pour the egg batter into a thin sheets and just remove immediatly from the pan and put on a cornflour dusted surface so that it does not stick to the surface repeat the same.
Now take one sheet stuff the paneer mixture and roll like spring rolls, repeat the same and deep fry the roll in oil till golden colour.

name: Paneer paratha
desc: Paneer Paratha is nothing but Indian bread stuffed with cottage cheese.It is a filling and healthy dish usually served with raitha or curd or pickle.Punjabi cuisine is associated with food from the Punjab region of India and Pakistan.
instructions:
In a bowl, add wheat flour, salt and make it to the soft dough by adding water in small quantities.
Then pour 1 tablespoon of oil, knead the dough for 15 minutes.
Take grated paneer, green chilies, salt, curry leaves, amchur powder mix well and make into balls.
Now take the soft dough,  divide into small dumplings, flatten it.
Later stuff the paneer mixture in middle and seal it and make roll into round shape like paratha, roti and cook on tawa both the side.
Cook this parathas by applying butter on both sides or can cook it like dry paratha can applying butter on top before serving.

name: Oats Masala paratha
desc: Paratha, a stuffed Indian Bread which is so delicious and generally served as main dishes in most of the Indian Restaurants.
instructions:
In a bowl take wheat flour, salt, mix with water make into soft dough let it rest for 15min.
In  another bowl add Oats, chilli powder, turmuric powder, coriander powder, dry mango powder (amchur), chopped curry leaves, chpped coriander leaves, salt, mix well by adding little by little water and make into small ball.
Now take the small portion of dough, stuff the Oats balls, seal and roll into paratha.
Heat griddle or tawa and cook stuffed paratha  from both the sides using butter or oil . Serve hot with curd and pickle.

name: sweet meat balls
desc: Meatballs are made with ground lamb, onions, egg, and bread crumbs, browned in a skillet, and simmered with vinegar, soy sauce, cornstarch, ketchup, etc.
instructions:
In a pan add butter, cumin seeds, chopped onions, salt mix well now add the kapurs cut into 4 parts mix well, now add ginger garlic paste, turmuric, green chillies , red chilli pwd, coriander pwd, mix well cook for 10 min by closing a lid.
After 10-15 min remove the lid add garamasala, pepper pwd, coriander leaves mix well switch of the flame and serve hot

name: Hot tomato and spring onions
desc: How to makeHot tomato and spring onions?How to cookHot tomato and spring onions?Learn the recipeHot tomato and spring onionsby vahchef.For all recipes visit vahrehvah.com
instructions: Take a pan add murstard oil, cumin seeds, urad dal, onions, salt mix well now add turmuric, curry leaves, tomatoes,nbsp;red chilli pwd, salt mix well now add spring onions chopped mix well and cover it up with lidnbsp;and cook for 10minsnbsp; once it done add garamasala mix well and serve with roti

name: Chicken and Dill leaves masala
desc: Chicken and dill leaves masala is an excellent non-vegetarian dish; chicken pieces cooked with fresh herbs, tomato and spices thick gravy. Dill leaves and cilantro being the main ingredients in this dish gives a refreshing and wonderful aroma to the dish.Succulent pieces of chicken cooked in a spicy and delicious dill leaves masala has a distinctive taste and tastes extremely good with roti, chapatti, naan or rice.
instructions:
Marinate the chicken with salt, chili powder, turmeric powder, curd mix well and keep aside for 3hrs.
Now in a pan add butter, cumin seeds, onions, ginger garlic paste, dill leaf mix well and add the chopped tomatoes let the tomatoes cook well.
Then add marinated chicken cook for 30minutes now add pepper powder, garam masala powder mix well and cook for another 10minutes.
Once chicken is done serve with rice or chapati

name: crispy sweet corn
desc: Crispy Sweet Corn is a delicious American recipe served as a Snacks and crispy Corn Chat is a great dinner appetizer, makes for a good tea time snack
instructions:
In a bowl add ginger garlic paste, pepper powder, salt, add 1 tablespoon cornflour, egg mix well then add the sweet corn and keep it aside.
In another bowl add 2 tablespoon cornflour, maida mix well then add the corn and coat the flour then strain off the excess flour and keep aside.
In the sweet corn balance mixture add the cashew nuts mix well and transfer to a dry flour coat it then strain off the excess flour and keep aside.
Now heat oil and deep fry the corn once it is done remove then add the cashew nuts and fry once done keep aside.
In another pan add 1 tablespoon oil, onions, ginger garlic crushed, green chillies, chopped coriander leaves, curry leaves, salt, soya sauce mix well then add the fried sweet corn and cashew nuts mix well  then serve hot

name: silky butter sauce in 2 minutes
desc: Butter Makhani Sauce is a very flavourful, aromatic butter based tomato cream sauce seasoned with spices and herbs.
instructions:
Heat butter in a pan and while the butter is melting, add in all the spices at one time (i.e. chilli powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, kasuri methi, garam masala powder, turmeric powder, salt, and a pinch of sugar), add brown onion or onion powder, mix well.
Add tomato puree and tomato ketchup and combine all the ingredients well together.
Cover the pan with a lid and cook the sauce for 1 minute or until the butter oozes out.
Remove the lid and add cream little by little stirring continuously or else it will get curdled, mix well.
Switch off the flame, the silky butter sauce is ready.

name: CHILLI MUSTARD PICKLE
desc: Small pieces of green chillies cooked with mustard and served as pickle and salad accompaniment to many Maharashtrian recipes.
instructions:
Heat oil and when it gets hot, add a pinch of hing, turmeric powder and mix well.
When they get nicely dissolved in the oil, add chopped green chilies and saute well.
Add salt and cook, do not overcook them, they need to get a nice shine on the skin and tender.
Add crushed yellow mustard powder, mix reduce the flame, cover the pan and just cook for 1-2 minutes.
Finally, you can sprinkle a pinch of black salt or half lime juice and serve.

name: Ansa-Phansachi Bhaji
desc: Ansaphansa chi bhaji is an authentic sweet, sour and spicy dish from the Maharashtrian cuisine made with ripe pineapple, jackfruit and mangoes cooked in creamy delicious gravy.
instructions:
Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan and when it gets hot enough, add mustard seeds. When the mustard seeds crackle, add cumin seeds, curry leaves, hing, turmeric powder, garam masala, goda masala.
Take about 10-12 whole red chilies and coconut powder and make a fine paste of this and add to the above mixture. Cook over a slow flame till oil oozes out in the sides.
Add salt and mix well. When the masala is nicely cooked and the raw flavours are gone, then add the pineapple and jackfruit pieces, mix and then add about a cup of water, cover and cook on a slow flame for 5 minutes or until they become soft.
Add ripe mango pieces and mix. Add 2 tablespoons of crushed mango pulp and mix well and cook for another 1-2 minutes and the dish is ready to be served.

grind the sticky rice first. mix black sesmy seed and brown sugar.
