Heat water in a bowl add vinegar, salt, add chicken breast, cook it for 2 minutes then transfer to a plate, and let it cool down then pull out the chicken into thin threads, add the flour into the threads and mix it well, and strain the chicken threads to remove the excess flour.
Heat oil in a pan and deep fry the chicken threads in a golden color.
Transfer to a plate, and sprinkle garam masala, chili powder, salt, amchur powder, mix it well, and serve.

name: CUCUMBER AND BENGAL GRAM CHUTNEY
desc: A crunchy chutney of cucumber with dals, and peanuts. A sour kind of chutney to be best eaten with plain rice, soothing dal and also with papad.
instructions:
Take a yellow cucumber and cut into small pieces along with seeds. Heat oil in a pan add coriander seeds, roast this seeds for a minute, then add fenugreek seeds, peanuts, sesame seeds, saute it for a minute.
Add green chili, tamarind, chana dal, salt, cucumber pieces, fry it for 2 to 3 minutes.
Then add coriander and saute it for a minute, switch off the flame and let it cool down then transfer it into the blender and make a coarse paste.
Heat oil in a pan for tempering add mustard seeds when mustard seeds splutter add cumin seeds, saute it and add soaked chana dal, red chili, urad dal, curry leaves, saute it for a minute then switch off the flame.
Pour this tempering on the top of the chutney and mix it.Serve this chutney with plain rice or curd rice.

name: DHANIYA EGGPLANT FRY
desc: Mostly found in southern part. Easy and very tasty masala fry dish cooked with chana dal and coriander seeds.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan add red chillies, chana dal, coriander seeds saute it for 5 minutes.
In a blender add garlic cloves, onions in this add red chilli, coriander seeds, chana dal make it into a coarse paste.
Heat a pan add oil once it hot add eggplant pieces, salt, prepared red chilli and coriander paste mix it well cook this for 5 minutes with the lid on.
After 5 minutes open the lid and cook it for 2 more minutes then switch off the flame.Serve with sambar rice or curd rice or chapatti.

name: EGGPLANT DAL
desc: A classic dal recipe with white brinjal cooked in boiled dal. This sour dal is a mouth-freshing dish with all the freshness in the eggplant or brinjal.
instructions:
In a pressure cooker put toor dal, chana dal, two tomatoes, green chilli cook this till dals are tender.
Heat oil in a pan add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, when mustard and cumin seeds splutter add crushed whole garlic saute it, add curry leaves, pinch of turmeric powder, onion big pieces saute it for 2 minutes.
Add eggplant pieces, amchur powder, red chilli powder, salt add required water mix it and cook it for 3 minutes in a slow flame with lid on.
Then add boiled dal mix it, once it comes to boil switch off the flame. Serve with rice.Serve with rice.

name: Cashew Chicken Manchurian
desc: Cashew Chicken in Manchurian style is an awesome, truly enticing stir-fry dish where the batter coated chicken is nicely air fried first in the Philips air fryer, an excellent modern technology to avoid deep-frying foods, and then is stir-fried in a non-stick pan with a medley of exotic veggies and a spicy, sweet and tangy slurry.
instructions:
In a bowl, put in the chicken pieces, add a little salt, pinch of pepper, little egg and mix well.
In a plate, put all-purpose, corn starch, mix well and add the chicken pieces and coat well. Brush very little oil the chicken pieces.
Preheat the air fryer and then put the chicken pieces into the air fryer at 180 degrees C for 7-8 minutes and fry them until done.
In a pan, add very little oil, few cashew nuts, and a pinch of salt to color them.
Add finely chopped garlic, ginger, and salt. Add chopped onions and fry till they are translucent.
Add a little salt, green chilies, pepper powder, MSG, soya sauce, chili paste, little water, and mix. Add a pinch of sugar and mix again.
Add in the air fried chicken pieces and toss well.
Garnish with some spring onions and serve hot.

name: Cheese Lings
desc: Cheese lings are light brown, crispy fried, bite-size biscuits made of flour, mixed with butter and cheese, lightly spiced to give a nice essence and zest. These mouth melting cheesy lings are extremely innovative, comforting and light snack.
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add all-purpose flour, baking powder, a pinch of salt, chili powder, butter, grated cheese and mix well (like short crust method).
Add few drops of water in the flour mixture and make a stiff dough.
Just knead the dough for a while. Sprinkle some flour on the table and with help of a rolling pin, roll the dough into a thin sheet.
Cut them into desired shapes.
Preheat the Philips air fryer at 180 degrees C for 3 minutes.
Pull out the basket and drop in the Cheese lings and air fry them for 5 minutes.
After 2 minutes, pull out the basket; toss them and air-fry again for about 2-3 minutes.
Remove and serve hot with sauce.

name: Tea Time Fruit Cake
desc: A delicious, yummy and mouth-watering soft Fruit cake dunked with luscious candied fruits/ dried fruits, nuts and spices that delights your palate with an amalgamation of its explicit ginger, cinnamon and vanilla flavours. A fantastic tea time treat to go with a slice of fruit cake.
instructions:
Preheat the Philips Airfryer at 180 degree centigrade for 3 minutes. Lightly grease a round cake tin and line it with a double layer of baking parchment.
In a mixing bowl, add in the butter and cream the butter with a hand blender. Once the butter gets soft, add little by little powdered sugar and blend together until its light and fluffy.
Add little vanilla essence and egg mixture and whisk together.
In another bowl, add flour, tuitty fruity, caraway seeds, ginger powder, cinnamon powder, baking powder and mix well.
Shift the flour mixture in the butter mixture and slowly fold together well. Spoon the mixture into the greased cake tin.
Place the cake tin in the Philips Airfryer and bake for about 15 minutes at 180 degree centigrade.
After 15 minutes, remove the tray, insert a skewer in the cake and if it comes out clean take it out and cool.
Remove the lining sheet and sprinkle some powdered sugar over before cutting.

name: Spicy Chicken Wings
desc: Spicy Chicken Wings is yet another awesome, finger-licking recipe, easy to prepare and fast to cook. Marinated chicken wings are air-fried to perfection having crispiness outside and retain all the flavors intact, juicy and delectable on the bite. These delicious spicy chicken wings are favorite finger food in most parties that can be served as appetizers or starters.
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add in little salt, finely chopped garlic, soya sauce, oregano, lemon juice and freshly crushed black pepper. Mix this marinade well.
Add the chicken wings to the marinade and coat it well. Rest the marinated chicken wings in the fridge for at least 2 hrs.
Sprinkle some flour over the chicken wings and mix well. Repeat this for about 2 to 3 times. (This will help in giving a nice texture and crispness to the chicken wings on frying.) 
Preheat the air fryer at 180 degrees C for 3 minutes.
Remove the tray and drop in the marinated chicken wings and fry for 6 minutes at 180 degrees C.
After 3 minutes, remove the tray and toss the wings and fry again.
In another bowl, take finely chopped spring onions, vinegar, brown sugar and mix well until the sugar melts.
Add tomato ketchup, chilli sauce and mix well.
After 6 minutes, open the tray and coat the chicken wings with the sauce and refry them again for 2 to 3 minutes.Remove and serve hot.

name: Kheema Muttes
desc: Mutton Keema Kebab is an excellent dry snack item made with minced lamb meat combined with aromatic herbs, spices, grated cheese, and cream together, made into flat patties and air-fried until done. These mutties are subtle to taste and has an awesome melting texture that is truly exquisite and divine to the palate.
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add all the above ingredients and mix well.
Make them into small dumplings and slightly flatten them and keep aside.
Preheat the Airfryer at 200 degrees C for 3 minutes.
Open the tray and drop the kheema mutties and fry for 6 minutes at 200 degrees C.
Remove and serve with any sauce of your choice.

name: Cheese Corn and Spinach Pillows
desc: Cheese corn and spinach pillows are attractive innovative and highly nutritious snacks stuffed combined with succulent sweet corn kernels and nourishing spinach bound with cheese, spiced with freshly crushed black pepper and flavored with nutmeg powder to give a pleasant zest to the pillows.
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add in all the ingredients for stuffing, mix well and keep aside.
For making the pillow casing: In a bowl, drop in the flour, little baking powder, a pinch of salt, chili flakes, basil or oregano and mix.
Add little by little buttermilk and knead into soft dough.
Rest the dough for a while. Dust some flour on the table, take some dough and roll into a thin sheet.
Trim the edges and cut them into squares.
Fill in the stuffing on one side of the square.
Brush little water on the edges of the square, fold and seal the pillows.
In a bowl, make a thin mixture of flour and water and keep aside.
Dip the pillow, remove and coat with bread crumbs and keep aside.
Preheat the Philips Airfryer at 180 degrees C for 3 minutes.
Place the pillows in the tray and fry them for 4 minutes.
After few minutes, open the tray and brush them with little oil on both sides and re-fry for another 2-3 minutes.
Remove and serve hot with any sauce of your choice.

name: Nutty Butter Cookies
desc: This is a brilliantly customized nutty butter cookie having a crispy, crumbling texture with amazing flavors of almonds and cashew nuts topped with the cookie that works well to make it nutty with the nut-butter component in the recipe. This is an amazing cookie with very few ingredients and is a great tea time snack.
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add in the butter and cream well.
Add icing sugar, cream together until soft.
Add almond essence and mix.
Add flour and mix to make the dough.
With help of a rolling pin, roll the dough.
Sprinkle some nuts over the flat dough and roll once.
Cut them into squares or desired shapes.
Preheat the Philips air fryer at 180 degree C for 3 minutes.
Place the cookies in the basket and air fry at 180 degrees C for 7-8 minutes.Remove, cool and serve it.

name: Coconut Crusted Jumbo Prawns
desc: Coconut crusted jumbo prawns is an exceptionally flavourful and delicious seafood delicacy that is brilliantly air fried to give a fantastic crispy texture on the outer side and soft and juicy inside.
instructions:
Clean and de-vein the jumbo prawns.
In a mixing bowl, add lemon juice, ginger garlic paste, turmeric powder, pepper powder, red chilli powder, chopped coriander leaves, curry leaves, salt (to taste), beaten egg and mix well.
Dip the jumbo prawn in the marination and coat them well on all sides.
Then coat them with desiccated coconut and keep aside.
Preheat the Philips Airfryer at 180 degree centigrade for 3 minutes.
Place the jumbo prawns in air and fry at 180 degree centigrade for 6-8 minutes.Delicious Coconut crushed Jumbo prawns is ready to serve.

name: Cajun Spice Chicken Wings
desc: Cajun Spice rub Chicken wing is one of the best combinations of flavours that one must taste to delight their palate. The spice mix is combined with an amazing seasoning of little spicy cayenne peppers (chilli powder), freshly crushed pepper powder, a bit of earthy herbal touch flavours from oregano and dry parsley, drizzle of vinegar to give that tangy zest to the Cajun rub.
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add hung curd, chili powder, salt, finely chopped garlic, fried onion powder, oregano, dry parsley and mix well.
Coat chicken wings well with the marinate mixture. Rest in the fridge for about 3-4 hours.
Sprinkle 1 teaspoon of oil and mix well.
Before air-frying them. Add little vinegar, freshly crushed pepper and mix well.
Preheat the Philips airfryer at 200 degree centigrade for 3 minutes.
Remove the tray and put the chicken wings and fry for 3-4 minutes at 200 degree centigrade.
After 3-4 minutes, reduce the temperature to 180 degree centigrade and air-fry for 2-3 minutes. Remove and serve hot.

name: Multani Soofiyani Paneer Tikki
desc: Its a soofiyani style paneer recipe from multan of pakistan, made with healthy greens of meethi and Paneer.
instructions:
Cut the paneer into thick cubes.
For marination, take a bowl add hung curd, ginger garlic paste, chopped green chilies, cumin powder, shahi jeera, kasoori methi powder, garam masala powder, chopped spring onions, roasted chana dal powder, salt, oil, lime juice and mix it like a paste.
In this, add onion and capsicum dices, slowly mix them with the marination.
If using wooden skewers then soak the skewer sticks in water for 30 minutes.
Take a wooden skewer at a time start threading marinated onion, capsicum and paneer on the skewers gradually. Later coat paneer pieces with marination on skewer.
Then arrange all the skewers in a baking tray. Place the baking tray in the oven and bake it at highest temperature available.
Apply some melted butter over the paneer and vegetables and sprinkle little bit of chat masala.Serve it with mint chutney.

name: NAMKEEN DALMOTH
desc: Dalmoth is a traditional namkeen, dry snack, It is one of popular snack in North India made from fried lentils, nuts, spices, and sev.

name: MINT AND BABY CORN CURRY
desc: Baby corn mint curry is a  delicious Indian recipe. It is an aromatic combination of flavorful mint and sweet tender baby corn.
instructions:
First cut the tender baby corns into small pieces.
Dry roast poppy seeds, cinnamon, cardamom, cloves, coriander seeds and dry coconut. After roasting it for 2-3 minutes switch off the flame.
When it cools down to blend it in a mixie jar to make a fine powder.
Take oil in a hot pan and add shahi jeera, when they crackle add finely chopped onions. Add salt to it. When it turns brown add finely chopped green chilies, ginger garlic paste, fresh mint leaves.
Saute it properly and after cooking for 2-3 minutes add the baby corn pieces. Also add red bell pepper pieces, some red chili powder, masala powder and mix it properly.
Now add curd and some water. After mixing properly put the lid on and cook for 10minutes on a slow flame.
After 10minutes just check the pieces, if they are little crunchy then add a bowl of fresh cream and switch off the flame. 
After mixing it properly the dish is ready to be served with pulao, pulka, chapati, roti, and naan.

name: Pumpkin Rice
desc: Pumpkin rice is a delicious alternative to plain rice adds great taste to your rice.
instructions:
First grate pumpkin then takes some butter in a hot pan, then add sliced onions and salt.
Add green chilies chopped and curry leaves. Saute it.
Now add fresh green peas, grated Pumpkin and also some salt if needed. Saute it thoroughly and cook it for 5minutes till pumpkin is almost cooked.
Now add cooked rice and garam masala. Mix it properly and in the last add fresh coriander leaves.
Switch off the flame and serve hot.

name: Chapati Egg Roll
desc: Chapati Egg Roll is a simple and nutritious snack, perfect for busy morning breakfast and also lunch.
instructions:
In a bowl, add wheat flour, salt, and mix it with water to make a tight dough. Then add a little oil and mix it again. Keep it aside for resting.
Take two eggs in a bowl and beat it.
In a hot pan take some butter, add green bell pepper, carrot, pepper powder, coriander powder and saute it for some time.
Now add grated paneer, fresh coriander leaves finely chopped and salt. Mix it properly and transfer it to a plate.
Take a small portion of dough and roll it on to make big roti.
Cook it on a hot pan or tawa. Cook both the sides slightly and apply little oil on both the sides and take it off a plate.
Heat some butter in a pan, also add some oil. Pour the egg mixture on it and just spread it. Slow up the flame and top it up with the prepared vegetable stuffing. On this keep the half cooked roti or chapati and press it. Turn it another side slowly.
Transfer it on the silver foil and just roll it as shown in the video.Serve it with sauce during breakfast.

name: Chicken Wontons AirFryer
desc: Wontons are an interesting oriental starter here they are made of chicken and air-fried and using very little oil.
instructions:
For the outer casing: In a mixing bowl, add all-purpose flour, a pinch of salt and little by little hot water and knead to make a stiff dough. Cover and keep aside.
 For the stuffing: Take a mixing bowl, add chicken pieces, egg, white of spring onions, greens of spring onions, French beans, carrots, green chilies, coriander leaves, pepper powder, soya sauce, MSG, cornstarch and mix well.
Add some sesame seed oil and mix again. Keep aside.
With help of rolling pin, dust some flour on the table and roll the dough into a thin sheet. Take a cutter and cut into roundels and keep aside.
Apply some water on the edges of the roundels. Take some stuffing and place in the roundel and seal the edges (crescent shape).
Preheat the Air fryer at 180 degrees C. Brush the wontons with very little oil.
Pull out the basket and drop in the wontons.
Air-fry at 180 degrees C for 7 minutes remove; turn the wontons and air-fry again for about 3-4 minutes.Remove and serve hot with any sauce.

name: Gongura Semiya Pulihora
desc: Pulihora are made with variety of flavors with rice, this is one such pulihora made with Indian sorrel leaves and vermicelli.
instructions:
Heat ghee in a pan, add vermicelli and fry till they get nice color. Transfer to a plate.
In the same pan, heat oil, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, peanuts, cashew nuts, urad dal, chana dal and sauté them till they turn to light golden in color.
Add green chilies, curry leaves, turmeric powder, sorrel leaves, salt and cook till oil oozes out.
Now add water and allow to boil, then add fried vermicelli, and cook for 4-5 minutes.Delicious  Gongura Semiya Pulihora is now ready to serve.

name: POORI CHOCOLATE
desc: Poori chocolate is a fried flaky pastry either sprinked with a generous amount of cardamom flavored powdered sugar or dipped in cardamom flavored sugar syrup. It is traditional recipe of Andhra pradesh which is  called as Sanpangi  puvu.
instructions:
Take a bowl, add all purpose flour, pinch of cinnamon powder, ghee, salt and by adding water make it into a dough and rest it for 10-15 mins.
For sugar syrup, take a pan add little water and sugar, make it like a gulab jamun syrup.
Divide the dough into equal portions, and roll it like a small poori and give the gashes on the middle of the poori. And fold it two sides and close the edges. Deep fry the chocolate poori till it gets light brown in color.
And dip them in a sugar syrup for a minute, then transfer to a plate.
Finally sprinkle some cinnamon and sugar powder on top of the dipped poories and serve.

name: PUMPKIN MUFFIN
desc: These deliciously moist pumpkin muffins are made with Pure Pumpkin, it is a super food and can enjoy these delicious and nutritious muffins for breakfast or snack, consist of natural richness of vitamin A.
instructions:
Take a bowl add butter and sugar, cream it nicely and keep it aside.
In another bowl, add all purpose flour, baking powder, grated pumpkin mix it well.
Add eggs into the butter and sugar mixture and mix it well.
To that add vanilla essence, all purpose mixture then add raisins and mix it, pumpkin muffin mixture is ready.
Preheat the oven for 180-degree centigrade and grease it with butter.
Then pour the mixture into muffin moulds and bake them for around 15 minutes.Delicious

name: STEAMED EGG CURRY
desc: Egg curry is a perfect recipe those who often like the variation in recipes. In this recipe, eggs are steamed and simmered in the gravy and served with hot rice.
instructions:
Take a bowl, add eggs and beat nicely.
To this, add salt, pepper powder, mix it well then pour this into greased cake mould and steam it for 5 to 6 minutes.
After another 8 minutes, remove the mould and cut the steamed egg into cubes.
Heat oil in a pan, add chopped onions, salt, ginger garlic paste, turmeric powder, cook this till raw flavor is gone.
Now add tomato puree, red chili powder, cumin powder, coriander powder and cook it for 2-3 minutes on a slow flame.
Then add three colors of bell pepper, also add required water and cook with closed lid till capsicums are 80% done.
Add egg cubes, chopped coriander and put the lid on and cook for another 2 minutes, then switch off the flame.Serve this with pulka, chapati or roti.

name: BASIC TOMATO SPAGHETTI
desc: This is a versatile Italian dish, which is easy to make and delicious to eat with a meaty spaghetti with a homemade sauce.
instructions:
Boil water and add salt(to taste) then spaghetti, cook till 80% done.
Heat olive oil in a pan, add chopped garlic, chopped onions, salt, blanched tomatoes (removed skin and finely chopped), tomato puree, tomato ketchup, sugar, vinegar, chili flakes, pepper powder along with 1 cup of water and cook for 3 minutes till it comes to a thick consistency.
Now add oregano, thyme, rosemary, chopped red and green bell pepper pieces. Reduce the flame and cook till it thick.
Now add the cooked pasta mix it slowly. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve it hot.

name: PUFF PASTRY
desc: It is a light, flaky, mechanically leavened pastry containing several layers of fat
instructions:
In a bowl add all purpose flour, salt, sugar, lime juice and water, make it into a stiff dough, add 15 g of butter and knead it well, then it rest for 15 minutes. 
Roll the dough like a ½ inch in thick sheet, apply the butter up to ¾ th of the sheet and sprinkle the dry flour, and fold like an envelope.
Take the sheet and place it in the tray, cover it with a wet cloth and put it in a fridge for 20 minutes.
Repeat the same process for another 2 times Now take out the tray and apply the butter on the sheet and fold like a book, cover it with a wet cloth and put it in the fridge, this can be used whenever required.

name: POPPY SEEDS BUTTER CHICKEN
desc: Poppy Butter chicken which is also knows as Murgh Makhani, pieces of chicken cooked in butter with poppy seeds sauce which is a favorite specialty in all over India.
instructions:
Dry roast poppy seeds on low flame by adding some salt and blend into a smooth powder.
Heat oil in a pan, add onion, ginger garlic paste,turmeric powder, curry leaves and butter. Saute for few minutes.
Add chicken pieces and cook on slow flame till chicken is all done.Add some salt,pepper powder, chili powder,garam masala powder and mix well.  Cook with closed lid by stirring occasionally.
Then add poppy seeds powder and mix it well. Add in some water as required and cook on low flame till its dry.
Sprinkle some lemon juice and coriander leaves.Serve it hot.

name: CHEESE STRAWS
desc: Cheese straws are a traditional food of the Southern United States. They are eaten as an appetizer or snack,  They are made using a cookie press and dough made with butter, flour.
instructions:
In a bowl add all purpose flour, salt, sugar, lime juice and water, make it into a stiff dough, add 15 g of butter and knead it well, then let it rest for 15 minutes.
Roll the dough ½ inch in thickness, apply the butter up to ¾ th of the sheet and sprinkle the dry flour, and fold like an envelope.
Take the sheet and place it in the tray, cover it with a wet cloth and put it in a fridge for 20 minutes.
Repeat the same process for another 2 times Now take out the tray and apply the butter on the sheet and fold like a book.
And take the sheet and place it in the tray cover it with a wet cloth and put it in the fridge.
Cut the required piece and roll into a thin sheet by using dry flour and apply milk on the sheet.
On top of the sheet grate the cheese, sprinkle some chili powder.
Cut the sheet into strips and twist the strips to look like a straw.
place the straws in a tray and apply the milk. Pre heats the oven at 220-degree centigrade.
Place the tray in the oven bake it for 20 minutes.

name: BOW TIE COOKIES
desc: Very popular tea time snack in Hyderabad, found in most of all irani tea houses. These are cookies which is shaped into bow tie shape made of puff pastry
instructions:
In a mixing bowl, add all-purpose flour, salt, sugar, lime juice and combine the ingredients. Add little by little water and knead the flour into stiff dough.
Add 15 gms of butter to the dough and knead well again. Cover and rest it aside for 15 minutes.Sprinkle some dry flour on the table and roll the dough to ½ inch thick sheet.
Apply butter on ¼ th part of sheet. Sprinkle some dry flour and fold like an envelope.
Take the sheet and place it in a tray. Cover it with a wet cloth and rest the dough in the fridge for 20 minutes. Repeat the same process for another 2 times.
Now take out the tray and apply the butter on the sheet and fold it like a book. Cover and put it in the fridge for another 10 minutes.
Cut the dough into lengthwise strips, ¼ wide and two inches long, twist each cookies in the middle and place over the cookie sheet.
Give the cookies milk wash and bake at 220 degrees C for 15-20 minutes until they turn crisp and golden brown in color.

name: AMARANTHUS POTATOES CURRY
desc: Thotakura Bangaladumpa, is an Indian food recipe prepared with amaranthus leaves and potatoes.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan add mustard seeds, dry red chillies when they are splutter add cumin seeds,  chopped ginger and garlic saute it.
Add sliced onions, salt and saute it for a minute then add chopped green chillies, boiled potato pieces, coriander powder, cumin powder and toss it well.
In this add amaranthus leaves, sorrel leaves  and cook this for about 3-4 minutes.Serve it with chapattis, phulkas.

name: Fine Biscuits
desc: Very popular tea time snack in Hyderabad found in most of all Irani tea houses. These are cookies which are shaped like a disk and topped with sugar.
instructions:
Take a bowl, add all purpose flour, salt, sugar, squeeze lime juice in water and add in the flour to make it into a stiff dough.
Then add 15 grams of butter and knead it well, later let it rest for about 15 minutes in the refrigerator.
Roll the dough like a ½ inch in thick sheet, apply the butter up to ¾th part of the sheet and sprinkle the dry flour, and fold like an envelope.
Take the sheet and place it in the tray, cover it with a wet cloth and put it in a fridge for 20 minutes. Repeat the same process for another 2 times.
Now take out the tray and apply the butter on the sheet and fold like a book, cover it with a wet cloth and put it in the fridge for another 10 minutes.
Cut the required piece and roll into a thin sheet by using dry flour.
Sprinkle sugar on top then roll it and cut into 4 equal portions.
Dip the pieces in the milk, coat with sugar again, and press it with your palm and roll it like a disc.
Place the Biscuits on the baking tray and bake it for around 15 minutes, until it gets golden brown.Delicious Fine Biscuits is now ready to eat.

name: Green Peas and Drumstick Puli 2
desc: Green peas and drumstick puli is a south Indian recipe and  great side dish for rice.

name: CHEF STYLE MUSHROOM CHICKEN
desc: This chicken and mushroom curry is curry that's packed with full, fragrant flavour mild in heat yet so vibrant in Indian.
instructions:
In a bowl add all purpose flour, salt, thyme, pepper powder mix it well then coat the chicken with this flour mixture. 
Heat the oil in a pan and fry the chicken pieces until it gets a nice color.
And fry the potato pieces and keep it a side.
In the same pan add garlic cloves, bay leaf, onion slices, salt and saute it for 2 minutes.
Once the onions are cooked, add mushrooms, crushed pepper powder, chicken stock, vinegar, garam masala powder, soya sauce, tomato ketchup, cook for another 2 minutes.
Then add fried chicken and potato pieces, put the lid on and cook for 15 minutes in a slow flame. Serve this with Rice, Roti and Bread.

name: PANEER PUFFS
desc: The Vegetarian option of these puffs are very popular and also very easy to prepare.
instructions:
Take a bowl add all purpose flour, salt, sugar, lime juice and water, make it into a stiff dough, add 15 g of butter and knead it well, then it rest for 15 minutes.
Roll the dough like a ½ inch in thick sheet, apply the butter up to ¾th part of the sheet and sprinkle the dry flour, and fold like an envelope.
Take the sheet and place it in the tray, cover it with a wet cloth and put it in a fridge for 20 minutes, Repeat the same process for another 2 times
Now take out the tray and apply the butter on the sheet and fold like a book, cover it with a wet cloth and put it in the fridge for another 10 minutes.
For stuffing: Heat oil in a pan add bell pepper, tomatoes, chili powder, coriander powder, a pinch of garam masala, turmeric powder, chopped coriander, salt, paneer pieces saute it for 2 minutes then switch off the flame.
Cut the required piece from the dough and roll into a thin sheet by using dry flour and cut into four squares and put in a spoonful of mixture, then apply the water on edges and seal the edges pressing together.
Place the puffs on the baking tray and milk wash on top, bake it at 220 degrees for 20 minutes.Serve with tomato ketchup

name: MIXED VEG PUFF
desc: Veg puffs are very delectable snack popularly known as curry puffs.
instructions:
In a bowl add all purpose flour, salt, sugar, lime juice and water, make it into a stiff dough, add 15 g of butter and knead it well, then it rest for 15 minutes.
Roll the dough like a ½ inch in thick sheet, apply the butter up to ¾th part of the sheet and sprinkle the dry flour, and fold like an envelope.
Take the sheet and place it in the tray, cover it with a wet cloth and put it in a fridge for 20 minutes, Repeat the same process for another 2 times 
Now take out the tray and apply the butter on the sheet and fold like a book, cover it with a wet cloth and put it in the fridge for another 10 minutes.
For stuffing: Heat oil in a pan add finely chopped carrot, beans, turmeric powder, salt saute it and add capsicum, tomatoes, boiled potato pieces, curry powder, chopped coriander saute it for 2 minutes then switch off the flame.
Cut the required piece from the dough and roll into a thin sheet by using dry flour and cut into four squares and put in a spoonful of mixture, then apply the water on edges and seal the edges pressing together.
Place the puffs on the baking tray and milk wash on top, bake it at 220 degrees for 20 minutes. Serve with tomato ketchup.

name: PHILIPS AIR FRYER POT STICKERS
desc:
Pot stickers are all time favorites for many and this airfryed version is is really awesome 
 which are stuffed with finely shredded cabbage seasoned
instructions:
Prepare dough of all-purpose flour, salt (to taste) by using hot water. 
For the stuffing take a bowl, add grated cabbage, finely chopped garlic, sweet corn, spring onion, green chilli, pepper powder, soya sauce, sesame seeds, salt, butter and mix it. Then add flour and mix it again.
Roll the dough into thin sheet by using dry flour.  Cut them into small stickers using the cutter.
Take the stuffing and make it into a small dumplings and place it on pot stickers.  Apply water to the edges and seal it to bring into a fancy shape.  Preheat the air fryer at 180 degree C for 5 minutes.
Place the pot stickers in the fryer to fry.
After 5 minutes Pull out the basket and apply the water and oil mixture and toss it well, again fry it for 5 minutes.  After 5 minutes switch off the airfryer and rest it for 2 minutes.Serve it with any sauce.

name: Soya Chunk grannules / kheema Curry
desc: Soya Chunks is an excellent source of protein and has a lot of health benefits too.This gravy is medium spicy so it's suitable for kids too. Soya Chunks is tasteless and has a tendency to absorb any flavor that it is cooked with so.
instructions:
Take some oil in a hot pan and add finely chopped onions, ginger garlic paste, turmeric powder, sorrel leaves, tomatoes and cook it for 2-3 minutes. Now add red chilly powder, coriander powder, salt, soya chunks which
Now add red chili powder, coriander powder, salt, soya chunks which are already soaked in hot water, just squeeze the water and mix it. Add
Add a little water, garam masala powder, coriander leaves and after cooking for 2-3 minutes switch off the flame. Serve hot with rice andServe hot with rice and pulka.

name: SWEET POTATO CHAAT
desc: A tangy and sweet chat made with sweet potatoes mingled in chat masala, chilies, rock salt and lime juice gives an additional flavor to it.
instructions:
Grate the skin of sweet potatoes and boil them. Now cut them into ½ inch slices.
Take it in a bowl and sprinkle some corn flour, rice flour on it.
Add finely chopped green chilies, red chili flakes, rock salt, chat masala, cumin powder, amchur powder, garam masala and lemon juice.
Mix it nicely with hand or just toss them.
To pan-fry the slices add oil in a hot pan. Place the slices on pan and let them cook till they become golden brown both the sides.
Transfer the slices to a plate and arrange them.
Now apply some green chutney, and sprinkle some finely chopped onions.
Sprinkle chat masala, sev and add sweet chutney. At last sprinkle, coriander leaves and serve as an evening chat.

name: BANANA CUSTARD ROLLS
desc: This exotic recipe for Banana Rolls with Custard Sauce can be readily customized which can be prepared more yummy by adding various fruits and dry fruits.
instructions:
In a bowl add wheat flour, maize flour and add required water make it into soft dough, add oil and knead it well, rest it for 5 minutes.
Divide the dough into equal portions and roll it like a chapati by using dry flour.
Cook the chapati both sides by adding oil or butter on a hot nonstick pan. Transfer this in a plate when they get nice colour.
Apply custard paste in the middle of the chapati and place banana pieces on it. You can also add pomegranate, apple pieces and dry fruits.  Just roll it now and cut into half.
Can wrap aluminium foil while serving.

name: HEALTHY RANCH STYLE DRESSING
desc: Easy healthy ranch dressing recipe with all real food ingredients like yogurt and spices.
instructions:
In a bowl add broccoli, cucumber, tomatoes, potatoes, chick peas , spinach, lettuce and mix well.
To that add egg slices and keep a side
In a mixing jar add chives, dill leaves, parsley, deseeded tomato peace's, yoghurt, pepper powder, salt and blend it, then add chick peas and blend again until you get a thick sauce.Pour this dressing in to salad mix it and serve.

name: Healthy Street Style Sandwich
desc: One of the yummiest healthy street food that you can prepare at home which is highly nutritious and appetizing to eat
instructions:
Take a sandwich Bread slice on the top of it put beetroot slices, potato slices, tomato slices, cucumber slices, grated carrot.
Apply the mint chutney on other bread slice and put this on the top of vegetable bread and cut into pieces and serve.

name: BEETROOT AND PANEER SALAD
desc: How to makeBEETROOT AND PANEER SALAD ?How to cookBEETROOT AND PANEER SALAD ?Learn the recipeBEETROOT AND PANEER SALAD by vahchef.For all recipes visit vahrehvah.com
instructions:
In a bowl add soaked and boiled Peanuts, kidney beans and boiled beetroot pieces, chopped bell pepper, Paneer pieces, chopped spring onions, sprinkle some salt and add lemon juice, chat masala, crushed pepper powder, honey, chopped dill leaves and lettuce, then mix well. 
Serve immediately.

name: MASTER CLASS FESTIVE FAMILY BIRYANI
desc: Masterclass festive family biryani is a special biryani dedicated to all families who love biryani with individual preferences of vegetable and meats served in a separate box. This combo meal prepared along with a popular dessert recipe in the simplest way possible.
instructions:
Master Marinade:Take oil (leftover oil of fried onions) in a bowl and add bay leaves, cardamom, cloves, cinnamon stick, and mace. Grate little nutmeg and add ginger garlic paste, coriander leaves, mint leaves, peppercorn, green chilies, salt and yogurt. Mix them properly and add crushed fried onions then keep it aside for 30 min.Vegetable biryani:Take beans, carrot, green peas, potatoes and lime juice in a bowl. Add mint paste, green chili paste, shahi jeera and kasoori methi. Now add the marinade sauce, almond powder and mix well. Fill the tiffin box with this marinade then add cashew nuts and keep it aside.Egg biryani :Take 3 full spoons of the marinade in a bowl and add turmeric, crushed pepper, lemon juice. Mix all the ingredients and transfer it to the tiffin box. Now place two scooped potatoes on it and add the leftover marinade in this.
Break two eggs in a bowl and fill the potato with this. Sprinkle crushed pepper on this and just keep it aside.Chicken Biryani:Take 3 full spoons of the marinade in a bowl and add cashew nut powder, white pepper powder, and lemon juice. Now add brine chicken pieces and mix properly. Transfer this to the tiffin box.Lamb biryani:Take lamb pieces in a bowl and add papaya paste, red chili powder, and lime juice. Now rub or mix this with your fingers and keep in the fridge for 6 hours to rest.
Add 2 spoons of the marinade in this and after mixing transfer this in a tiffin box.Khubani ka meetha:Soak khubani in water for 2-3 hours and remove the seeds. Boil them and mash it. Add the same soaked water and sugar then mix it. Keep it aside for a while.Biryani rice (veg, chicken and lamb):Soak basmati rice for nearly 30 minutes. Add salt to the boiling water then add shahi jeera and oil (leftover oil of fried onions). Once water starts boiling add soaked rice and just mix it once. When rice is 75% cooked, switch off the flame and take one load of rice to fill in the box of lamb biryani.
Repeat the same process for chicken biryani and tap the box so that the ingredients in it sets well. Add saffron water, ghee, and fried onions for each biryani and then close the lid to keep aside. Add ghee in the sweet . Add kevra water for lamb biryani and rose water for chicken biryani at the end and close the box. Now its time to cook all the recipes in a handi. Fill the surface with rock salt or sand.
Scrape little of salt and place the lamb box first then the rest of the boxes. To build steam in the handi place a aluminium mould in between and fill it with rice water. Now start sealing the handi edges with dough and wet it with little water, then keep the lid on. Place some hot charcoal pieces on the lid and put some weight also.
Let it cook on high flame for 15 minutes, medium flame for 30 minutes and slow flame for 15-20 minutes. After an hour remove the lid with the help of a spoon. Now very carefully with the help of cloth take the boxes out. Time to serve hot biryani with very special khubani ka meetha.

name: CREAMY VEGETABLES IN BREAD CUPCAKES
desc: These moist muffins go over great with the kids. Made with vegetables and cream.
instructions:
Take the bread pieces and cut the edges, flatten it with rolling pin.
Place the flatten bread pieces and cut into round shape with a cutter. Place them in muffin moulds coated with butter..
Bake the muffins at 180 degree C for 5 to 6 minutes.
For the stuffing Heat a pan and add finely chopped onions, garlic, butter saute it for a minute.
Now add chopped carrot, sweet corn, celery, salt, all purpose flour mix it well.
Then add white pepper powder, oregano, milk, cream keep mixing it for 2 minutes.
 Add nutmeg powder mix it well and pour this mixture in the bread cups and add the grated cheese on top.
Bake it for 200 degree C for 10 minutes.

name: DRUMSTICK PLANTAIN BIRYANI
desc: This awesome vegetarian Biryani combination of raw plantain & Drumstick made with a special home made masala
instructions:
Dry roast shah jeera, star anise, cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, maize, bay leaves, poppy seeds, red chilies, coriander seeds, all the ingredients on a slow flame.
After 2 to 3 minutes switch off the flame and add coconut pieces. Let it cool down then make it into a fine paste.
Heat oil in a handi, add plantain pieces, fry it for 2 minutes then keep aside.
In the same handi, add chopped onions, salt, saute it till they get brown color.
Now add drumstick pieces, turmeric, ginger garlic paste and saute it.
Then add green chilies, mint leaves, coriander leaves, fried plantain pieces, yogurt, tomato slices and add prepared masala with some water mix it well and let it cook for 3 minutes with closed lid.
In a hot water add oil, salt and soaked rice cook till  90%  is done.
In a Biryani vessel, add one layer of 80% cooked rice then add second and third layer 90% cooked rice sprinkle chopped coriander leaves, ghee, lemon juice on top, put the lid on and let it cook for 10 minutes in a slow flame.
After 10 minutes switch off the flame and rest it for 5 more minutes.  Finally add fried bread pieces and serve it hot.

name: PALAK BREAD BAJJI
desc: Palak bread bajji is a delicious and crispy snack prepared with spinach leaves.
instructions:
First of all cut the edges of the bread slices and keep it aside.
 Now take chickpea flour, spinach, carom seeds, coriander powder, ginger garlic paste, red chilli powder, salt, soda and water. Mix it well and make the bajji batter.
Dip the bread pieces(slices cut in triangle shapes) in the batter and deep fry them in hot oil.
Take them out on tissue paper when they turn golden brown both the sides.

name: PALAK AND METHI THEPLA
desc: Palak Methi Thepla is a delicious Indian recipe served as a Breakfast.
instructions:
Take wheat flour in a bowl and add chickpea flour, carom seeds(ajwain), turmeric, coriander powder, red chilli powder, spinach, methi leaves, oil and mix properly.
Add salt and water, then make nice dough and let it rest for 5 minutes.
 Now divide this dough into small portions and roll into small puri’s with the help of some flour.
Add little oil on a hot pan and pan fry the theplas.
 Apply oil on both the sides and cook them.
Transfer in a plate when they become brownish colour.

name: RAW BANANA CHAAT
desc: Banana Chat Recipe is the flavorful Indian snack dish of Raw Banana. It is a tangy and easy recipe usually had on evenings.
instructions:
Peel out raw plantain skin and grate it.
Now add boiled and mashed potato, curry leaves, green chilies paste, cumin seeds, amchur powder, spring onion, red chili flakes, salt and mix it.
Now add chickpea flour and mix it again.
Make small dumplings and flatten them (like vadas), then deep fry them in hot oil.
Take them out on tissue paper once they become golden brown.
Arrange each vada on top of tomato slice then season with curd, cumin powder, chat masala, red chili powder, chopped onions, sev, green chutney, sweet red chutney, fresh coriander leaves.Yummy and tasty RAW BANANA CHAT is ready to serve.

name: DRY CHANA DAL FRY
desc: Dry chana dal fry is an easy to make and quick recipe.
instructions:
Take some oil in a pan and add onions, then saute it for few minutes with salt in it.
Now add ginger garlic paste, turmeric, boiled chana dal, red chilli powder, coriander powder and mix it well.
Cook it till it becomes dry.
Now add garam masala powder and mix it thoroughly.
Switch off the flame and serve with roti or phulka.

name: DAL RASAM
desc: Dal Rasam is a very comfort food in traditional South Indian cuisine.
instructions:
Add some oil in a hot pan and add cumin seeds, mustard seeds, green chillies, onion slices, garlic and saute it.
 Now add salt , red chilies, curry leaves, turmeric, and mix well.
After 2 minutes of cooking add boiled chana dal water and tamarind juice.
After 2-3 minutes of boiling add coriander leaves and switch off the flame.
Serve with rice or bobbatlu.

name: BENDI MADHUR KHADI
desc: Bendi madhur khadi is a popular dish. Any dish made with okra is a rich source of dietary fiber. It is also keeps the digestion problem away. Proper digestion reflects through a healthy-looking skin.
instructions:
Soak the rice for 30 minutes, transfer it into a blender and blend into a smooth paste.
Heat oil in pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, fenugreek seeds, green chillies, onions, salt, curry leaves and saute it.
Add ginger garlic paste, turmeric powder, okra and saute it and cook it with closed lid for 2 minutes on slow flame.
When the okra is 40% cooked, add sambar powder, tamarind juice, little water and cook it for 3 minutes.
Take 1 tablespoon of rice paste, mix it in ½ cup of water, this mixture to the above okra mixture and cook it.
Add jaggery, coriander leaves and mix thoroughly.
Now the bendi madhur khadi is ready to serve with rice.

name: CREAMY MUSHROOM ON TOAST
desc: These creamy mushrooms are great as a small snack on toast.  It is very delicious and tasty treat.
instructions: 1. Heat butter in a pan and add garlic and saute it. 2. Add mushrooms, white pepper powder, salt and saute it for 1-2 mins and switch off the flame. 3. Atlast add fresh cream and mix thoroughly. 4. Now spread this mixture on the toast as shown in the video and serve it.

name: METHI PARATHA
desc: Methi paratha is a quick, healthy and flavorful Indian breakfast. In methi paratha recipe  green vegetables are very healthy. Make them a part of your diet and  serve it with chilled yogurt and a pickle of your choice.
instructions:
Method-11. Take a bowl and add 1 cup wheat flour, salt, 1 tablespoon of oil, water and make the soft dough and keep aside for 15 minutes.
 Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan and add cumin seeds, green chillies, onion, salt and saute it.
Add crushed garlic, methi leaves, cumin powder, pepper powder when the methi leaves are soft add amchur powder and mix thoroughly and keep the stuffing mixture aside.
 Take the small dumpling of the dough and make small poori and keep the methi stuffing and close the edge.
 With the help of rolling pin make the p+a6ratha.
 Heat the tawa and place the paratha and cook it on both side by using oil or butter.Method-2Take a bowl and add 3 tablespoon of stuffing and 3 tablespoon of wheat flour, little water and mix thoroughly and make the soft dough.
Now roll the paratha using rolling pin.
Heat the tawa and place the paratha and cook it on both side by using oil or butter.Now the methi paratha is ready to serve with any chutney.

name: SAAG COOKING GREENS
desc: Saag or sag is a leaf-based (spinach, mustard leaf, etc.) dish eaten in South Asia with bread such as roti or naan, or rice. Saag can be made from spinach, mint leaves or other greens, along with added spices and sometimes other ingredients such as paneer. On some menus, it is called saagwala. eating greens at least twice a week is very healthy.
instructions:
Chop spinach leaves, mustard leaves, celery leaves and keep aside.
 Heat mustard oil in a pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, urad dal, garlic, ginger, spring onions, salt, asafoetida, Chopped spinach leaves, mustard leaves, celery leaves, water, nutmeg and cook it for 10 minutes.
 Switch off the flame and add onions and squeeze lime juice.Now saag cooking greens is ready to serve with roti or rice.

name: POPPY SEEDS AND COCONUT PASTE
desc: Poppy seeds and coconut paste used in many vegetarian and non vegetarian dishes.
instructions:
Take a pan and dry roast the poppy seeds on medium flame for long time and keep it aside and transfer it into a blender which has the wet grinder blade.
Add little water and blend it and add dry coconut powder and blend it again until comes to a smooth paste .Now poppy seeds and coconut paste is ready.

name: GENERAL Tsos CHICKEN
desc: General Tso's Chicken is an awesome dish made with succulent pieces of chicken battered and deep fry until golden brown, tempered and cooked in a nice smooth sweet and sour sauce.
instructions:
Take a bowl, add chicken stock, 2 tablespoons of  soya sauce, hoisin sauce, sugar, rice vinegar, pepper and keep the sauce aside.
In a cup, mix corn flour and water and keep aside.
Take a bowl and add 1 tablespoon of  soya sauce, egg white and beat it.
Add corn flour and mix to a slightly thin batter consistency then add chicken and mix thoroughly.
Heat oil in a pan and deep fry the pieces on medium flame until the chicken is cooked.
Heat 2 tablespoons of  oil, add dry red chilies (optional), chopped garlic, ginger and saute it.
Then add fried chicken, prepared sauce, little cornstarch mixture and cook it until sauce is absorbed by the chicken pieces.Now transfer it into a plate and garnish with spring onions and serve it.

name: SAMBAR SADAM BISI BELE BATH
desc: A classic dish from the state of Karnataka made to a combination of rice, toor dal (lentil), assorted vegetables and freshly ground spices all mixed and cooked together. It is a very healthy and nutritious dish. Spices like cinnamon and asafoetida, curry leaves and tamarind pulp used in its preparation contribute to the unique flavor and taste of this dish sambar sadam.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan and add ½ teaspoon mustard seeds, ¼ teaspoon cumin seeds, cashew nuts, 2 nos dry red chilies, curry leaves, green chilies, onion, asafoetida and saute it.
Add potato, carrot, french beans, cauliflower, green peas, shallots, orka, ridge gourd, eggplant and turmeric powder and saute it.
Add toor dal, rice, sufficient water and cook it by placing a lid on it.
Take a pan and add dry red chillies, fenugreek seeds, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, cloves, cinnamon stick, cardamom, coriander seeds dry roast it on slow flame.
 Now add channa dal, urad dal, coconut, and dry roast it and transfer it into a blender and blend it into a powder.
When the rice is 75% cooked add tomatoes, salt and cook it.
When the rice is 90% cooked add dal mixture powder, tamarind juice and mix thoroughly and cook it.
Atlast add coriander leaves and switch off the flame.Now the hot sambar sadam is ready to serve with boondi and raitha

name: CORN PAKODA FRESH
desc: Corn Pakoda is a great snack item which has the freshness, crunchiness and sweetness of corn. It make a great tea time snack during monsoons.
instructions:
Remove the peel and cut corn seeds using knief.
Take the mixie jar and add green chillies, cumin seeds, coriander leaves, ginger garlic paste, roasted chana dal, garam masala, corn and blend it into a coase paste.
Add salt, all purpose flour, mix well and make round patti using hands.
Heat the pan, place the patti, sprinkle ghee on top and cook it on both sides.
Hot Corn Pattis are ready to serve then..Prepartion of Corn pakoda :Heat oil in a pan, place the corn fritters (i.e., corn pakoda) and deep fry until golden brown in colour.Serve the hot patti and pakoda with tomato or chilly sauce.

name: SHRIMP PRAWNS PULI/PULUSU
desc: Prawn in tamarind sauce is a tangy dish made with prawns cooked in a tangy sauce until tender. Shrimp pulusu is a very famous dish in Andhra Pradesh.
instructions:
Take a pan and add poppy seeds and dry coconut powder and dry roast it and transfer it to a blender and make the paste.
Take the bowl and add shrimp, 1 teaspoon ginger garlic paste, salt, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon red chili powder and mix thoroughly and keep aside.
Heat 3tablespoon oil in a pan and add the shrimp saute it and cook until it becomes tender and transfers it to a plate.
Heat 5 tablespoon oil in the same pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, onions, salt, green chilies, turmeric powder saute it.
Add ginger garlic paste, red chili powder, coriander powder, little water, poppy seeds, coconut paste and mix thoroughly and cook it on a slow flame until the masala is cooked.
 Add fried shrimp, tamarind juice, coriander leaves, a little salt, some water, and mix thoroughly and placing the lid, cook it on a slow flame for 5 minutes.Now the shrimp prawn pulusu is ready to serve with rice.

name: EGGPLANT DING CHICK CHUTNEY
desc: Any recipe prepared with eggplant is very delicious. Eggplant ding chick chutney is easy and tasty recipe served with roti and rice.
instructions:
Cut the eggplant into round slices.
Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds, eggplant and saute it.
Add green chillies, tamarind and coriander leaves,salt, little water and place the lid and cook it.
Smash it with pestle and add onion, garlic, coriander leaves and mix thoroughly.Now eggplant ding chick chutney is ready to serve with rice.

name: PANEER PASANDA
desc: Paneer pasanda is a snack recipe where paneer is stuffed and cooked in silky sauce.
instructions:
Take the triangle paneer piece and cut in the middle like a butterfly as shown in the video.
Take a bowl and add grated paneer, raisins, 2 tbs cashew nut, salt, coriander leaves, green chillies and mix thoroughly and stuff this mixture in the middle of paneer slice.
Take a bowl and add cornflour, all purpose flour, water and mix thoroughly to make the batter.
Dip the stuffed paneer pieces in the above batter.
Heat oil in a pan and cook the pieces on both sides and keep aside.
Heat 2 tablespoon oil in a pan and add whole garam masala, cumin, onion, turmeric powder, ginger garlic paste, tomatoes and place the lid and cook it for 5 minutes.
 Add 1 tablespoon cashew nut, red chili powder, coriander powder, little water and mix thoroughly and transfer it into a blender and make the fine paste.
Transfer it into a pan and little water and place the lid and boil it.
 Add salt, sugar, kasuri methi powder, fresh cream and mix thoroughly and add fried paneer pieces.Now the paneer pasanda is ready to serve hot.

name: CRAB CAKE
desc: Crab cake is a classic American dish prepared with crab meat and various other ingredients, such as bread crumbs, milk, mayonnaise, eggs, yellow onions, and seasonings.
instructions:
Remove the flesh from the crab and cut into pieces and mash it with hands like as shown in the video.
 Heat oil in a pan and add cumin, garlic, onions, little salt and saute it for 2 minutes and transfer it into a plate.
Add rice, red chili powder, coriander leaves, crab mixture, bread crumbs, egg and mix thoroughly and make the round balls and give the cutlet shape and keep aside.
Heat butter in a pan and add crab cakes and place the lid and cook it on both sides on slow flame. Now the crab cakes are ready to serve hot.

name: POTATO FRY PODIMAS
desc: This potato fry podimas(mashed potatoes) is a mildly flavored curry to go with hot and spicy sambar rice.
instructions: METHOD POTATO FRY: 1. Boil and cut the potato pieces, 2. Heat oil in a pan and fry the potato pieces on medium heat until it changes to golden brown in colour and keep aside. 3. Place the 1 spring curry leaves, coriander leaves, green chillies and dip in hot oil pan and fry it and place it on fried potatoes. 4. Sprinkle salt, red chilly powder and toss it. 5. Now potato fry is ready to serve hot. METHOD POTATO PODIMAS: 1. Boil and mash the potatoes slightly. 2. Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds, red chillies, cumin seeds, channa dal, urad dal, cashew nuts and saute it. 3. Add asafoetida, chopped green chillies, curry leaves, onion and saute it. 4. Add potato, coconut and cook it. 5. Atlast add lime juice and serve it.

name: Turkey Biryani Roast
desc: Turkey biryani roast is turkey stuffed with rice and cooked in the oven. In India, the aromatic rice dish known as biryani consists of layering cooked rice with spiced meat or vegetables before baking it.
instructions:
Take a roasting tray and add potato, celery, onions, sweet potato, carrot, turkey liver pieces, little water and spread as a bed.
Take a bowl and add yogurt, coriander leaves, mint leaves, green chillies, cashew nut, ginger garlic paste, raisins, 1 tablespoon cranberry, 1 tablespoon coriander powder, 1 tablespoon cumin powder, biryani mixture powder, salt and mix thoroughly.
Place the turkey on the vegetable bed layer of the roasting tray and Apply half of the above prepared mixture inside the turkey and other half mixture add it to rice and mix thoroughly.
Stuff the rice mixture inside the turkey and close the opening with cabbage.
Pack the leftover cabbage mixture in the cabbage or lettuce leaf and keep in the roasting tray.
Take the spices powder from turkey stuffing packet into a bowl and add 5 tablespoon lime juice, 5 tablespoon olive oil, salt and mix thoroughly and apply it on turkey and tie its legs.
Place the roasting tray along with turkey inside the oven 325 degree centigrade for 2 hrs
Take a cup and add olive oil, lime juice, crushed garlic, soya sauce and mix thoroughly and coat this mixture on the turkey for every 20 minutes.
After 2 hrs remove the turkey and keep aside.
Melt butter in a pan and add cumin, coriander powder, red chili powder, water and liver pieces from roasting tray.
Add cranberry chutney, salt and mix thoroughly and make the sauce.
Cut the knots of turkey legs and also cut turkey and place it in a serving plate. Now the hot turkey biryani roast is ready to serve with prepared sauce.

name: CORIANDER STEAMED CAKES
desc: This is a snack recipe. These are steamed coriander leaves and gram flour cakes, cut and fried crispy, available in many Maharashtrian restaurants and stores.
instructions:
Heat 3 tablespoon oil in a pan and add cashew nuts, chana dal and switch off the flame.
Add poppy seeds, garam masala, green chillies, coconut and saute it.
Crush the groundnut coarsely using pestle.
Take a bowl and add groundnut powder, roasted mixture, coriander leaves, chick pea flour, rice flour, salt, water and mix thoroughly.
Apply oil to a cake tin and transfer the above mixture and spread it evenly.
Place it in the steamer and steam it for 10 to 15 minutes.
Demould it and cut into pieces.
Heat 2 tablespoon oil in a pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, steamed pieces, sprinkle red chili powder and toss it.Now the coriander steamed cake is ready to serve hot.

name: ORIENTAL NOODLE SALAD
desc: This oriental noodle salad is an interesting Chinese flavour combined with crunchy fried noodles.
instructions:
Boil noodles in water with little salt. Then strain the water and cut them to small pieces and keep aside.
Take a bowl and add cabbage, tomato, red bell pepper, carrot, yellow bell pepper, green bell pepper, onions, moong dal sprouts, pepper powder, noodles, soya sauce, vinegar, sesame oil, salt and mix thoroughly.
Add green spring onions, sesame seeds and mix well.Now oriental noodle salad is ready to serve.

name: CURRY LEAVES BUTTERMILK
desc: The curry leaves ground to a fine paste and mixed with buttermilk. It can also be taken on an empty stomach with beneficial results in case of stomach upsets.
instructions:
Take the glass jar, add butter milk, water, asafoetida, lime juice, curry leaves, salt and mix thoroughly.
Check for seasoning and transfer it into a serving glass.Now the cool curry leaves buttermilk is ready to serve in hot summer.

name: CORIANDER AND LEMON BUTTER MILK
desc: This is very cool refreshing lassi in the hot summer season.
instructions:
Take a glass jar, add coriander leaves, salt, lime juice and blend it once.
Add butter milk and mix thoroughly.
Check the seasoning and transfer it into a glass.Now the refreshing coriander and lemon butter milk is ready to serve.

name: BEET ROOT LASSI
desc: A luscious and gorgeous masala spiced beetroot lassi is easy to make and tastes delicious summer special liquid recipe.
instructions:
Take the glass jar and add beetroot, green chilies, salt and blend it once.
Add little water and stain the juice into a bowl.
Transfer the juice into another glass jar and add fennel powder, again blend it.
Add butter milk and blend it and check for seasoning. Transfer it into a glass.Now the pink colour beetroot lassi is ready to serve.

name: ANTI SUN STROKE LASSI
desc: Sweet lassi is generally taken as cooling drink during summer season in northern. Chaas is also very good to fight sunstroke and indigestion.
instructions:
Take the glass jar and add cucumber, tomatoes, onions, lime juice, green chillies, coriander leaves and blend it.
 Add little water, salt, butter milk and blend it again.
Check for seasoning, transfer it into a glass. Now the anti sun stroke lassi is ready to serve cool.

name: PAPAYA AND HONEY LASSI
desc: Papaya lassi is perfect for summer heat. Lassi is an exotic and fun way to cool down on a hot summer day.
instructions:
Blend papaya to a thick consistency.
Add honey, butter milk, little water and blend it again. Transfer it into a  serving glass.Now the papaya and honey lassi is ready to serve  it chilled in hot summer.

name: MASALA TEA
desc: Masala tea is a flavoured tea beverage made by brewing black tea with a mixture of aromatic Indian spices and herbs.
instructions:
Take a bowl and add ginger powder, cardamom powder, tea powder and keep this masala mixture aside.
Take a pan and add water, milk and boil it, then add sugar.
When sugar is dissolved add masala mixture, nutmeg and boil it.
 Strain the masala tea it into a cup.Now the Masala tea is ready to serve hot.

name: MASALA BUTTER MILK
desc: Masala butter milk is a mildly spiced drink made with curds can be served as a coolant in summer. It can be taken if suffered by ulcer, to reduce body heat during summer.
instructions:
Take a glass jar and add green chili, ginger, cumin seeds, salt and blend it.
Add buttermilk, water and blend it again.
 Add some lime juice and mix it once and check for seasoning and transfer it into a glass jar.Now the cool masala butter milk is ready to serve in hot summer.

name: Kiwi and Mint Lassi
desc: Lassi is an exotic and fun way to cool down on a hot summer day. This kiwi lassi tastes very refreshing, with plenty of vitamins, perfect for diabetic people.
instructions:
Take the glass jar and add kiwi, mint, black salt and blend it once.
 Add butter milk, some water and blend it again.
Adjust the seasoning and transfer it into a glass.Kiwi and mint lassi is now ready to serve cool in hot summer.

name: STUFFED CHOUX PASTRY
desc: This recipe has a wonderful retro feel about it,  choux pastry can also be prepared to hold savoury filling and the beautifully crisp choux pastry.
instructions:
Boil water in a pan, add butter and melt it.
To it, even add all purpose flour by stirring it for 2 minutes so no lumps will be formed and keep aside.
Whisk the eggs in a bowl and add little by little to the above warm all purpose mixture by stirring nicely.
Then fill this mixture into the piping bag and piped it in the baking tray like as shown in video.
Bake at 180 degree centigrade for 20 -25 minutes.
Cut the pastry and fill it with whip cream like as shown in video.
Dip in chocolate ganache and top it with silver balls.Now stuffed choux pastry or is ready to serve.

name: ZUCCHINI MUFFINS
desc: The best zucchini bread muffins ever. Moist, sweet, packed with shredded zucchini, nuts. These are healthy whole wheat muffins are easy to make and popular with kids and adults.
instructions:
Take a bowl and add sugar, oil, eggs and mix thoroughly.
Take a plate and add all purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, herbs, pepper powder, cashew nuts, zucchini and mix it.
Add this mixture to egg mixture and stir it.
At last add cheese and mix nicely.
Pour this mixture in muffin moulds.
Bake them at 180 degree centigrade for 15 -20 minutes.
Demould and cut it.Now the zucchini muffins are ready to serve.

name: WHEAT FLOUR ATTU
desc: This is a very easy and healthy dosa prepared with just 2 main ingredients chickpea flour and wheat flour.
instructions:
Take a bowl and add wheat flour, chickpea flour, salt, water and mix it to make the dosa batter consistency.
Heat the tawa and add one ladle full of batter and spread it like dosa.
Cook it on both sides with little oil.Now the wheat flour attu is ready to serve with thick mango juice.

name: Gongura Mutton Biryani
desc: Mutton with sorrel leaves is all time favorite mutton dish. Gongura is very rich in iron, vitamins and folic acid. It has anti-oxidants essential for human body.
instructions:
Heat little ghee & oil in a pan, add black cumin seeds, dagad phool, onions, ginger garlic paste, green chilies and saute it.
Add turmeric powder, green chili paste, coriander powder, cumin powder, red chili powder, sorrel leaves, a little salt and saute it later cook it.
To it add tomatoes, coconut milk, coriander leaves, mint leaves, garam masala and mix it.
Add mutton marinated with raw papaya overnight and cook it. Boil water with little salt in another pan and add basmati rice and cook it till it is 80% done.
Arrange rice on top of mutton mixture and sprinkle fried onions.
Place the lid with rim covered with wheat dough and cook it for 20- 25 minutes.Now the gongura mutton biryani is ready to serve.

name: BOTTLE GOURD SARVA PINDI
desc: Sarva pindi is a savory pancake made in Telangana. It is a circular shaped item made of rice flour and peanuts. Grated bottle gourd can also be added to the dough. It is also called tappala.
instructions:
Take a bowl and add bottle gourd, rice flour, corn meal flour, coriander leaves, green chillies, onion, red chili powder, soaked chana dal, sesame seeds, curry leaves, ginger garlic paste salt and mix it, add little water and mix it again.
Add little oil in a pan and take large dumpling of the mixed dough using hand press it and make tiny holes.
Pour little oil and cook it with lid on it.Now the bottle gourd sarva pindi is ready to serve.

name: CABINET PUDDING
desc: Cabinet Pudding is a delicious Anglo-Indian recipe served as a Dessert. Cabinet pudding, also known as Chancellor's pudding, is a traditional English steamed, sweet, moulded pudding made from some combination of bread.
instructions:
Take a pan and add milk, sugar and boil it and keep aside.
Beat egg in a bowl and mix it in the above milk pan.
Take the butter applied small mould bowls and arrange the sponge bread pieces, raisins.
Take a strainer and pour the above milk mixture.
Cover it with foil and arrange in tray with little water.
Bake at 180 degree for 20 minutes and rest it for some time.
Demould it into a plate.Now the cabinet pudding is ready to serve.

name: BEAN PLANTAIN TOMATO RICE
desc: This is a kid special lunch box recipe, prepared with tomato, spicy beans, fried eggplant is easy to prepare.
instructions:
Peel and cut the raw plantain into round.
Heat oil in a pan, add plantain, shallow fry it and keep aside.
Later press it with masher then again fry it in the same oil and keep aside, sprinkle little pepper powder, salt.
Heat butter in a pan, add garlic, bay leaf and saute it till raw flavor of ginger is gone.
Add finely chopped onions, little salt to it and saute it.
To it, add red chili paste, chopped tomatoes and cook it, later add black eyed beans, little salt, rice and saute it.  Cook it with closed lid until water is evaporated.
Transfer into serving plate and add lime juice, garnish with spring onions, fried raw plantain.Now the bean plantain tomato rice is ready to serve.

name: BREAD STICKS
desc: Breadsticks are generally pencil-sized sticks of crisp, dry bread originating in Turin and the surrounding area in Italy.
instructions:
Take a bowl and add all purpose flour, salt, sugar, yeast, oil, water and mix it to make a hard dough, keep aside for 30 -40 minutes.
Divide the dough into small portions and and roll it with hands like as shown in video.
Sprinkle carom seeds and roll it again and keep aside for 30 minutes so that proofing take place.
Transfer into baking tray, give gases and bake at 220 degree for 15 minutes.Now the bread sticks are ready to serve with cheese.

name: CABBAGE CAPSICUM STIR FRIED RICE
desc: This is a  Indo-Chinese fried rice recipe.  A stir-fry loaded with the goodness of capsicum and cabbage.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves, red chillies, onions, ginger garlic paste, little salt and saute it.
Add cabbage and cook it for 2 minutes with lid on it.
Remove the lid and add bell pepper, red chili powder, rice and mix it once.
Cook it for 3 minutes on slow flame with lid on it.Now the cabbage capsium stir fried rice is ready to serve.

name: TORTILLAS STUFFED WITH RED BEAN SALSA
desc: A tortilla is a type of soft, thin flatbread made from finely ground wheat flour. Originally derived from the corn tortilla, a bread of maize which predates the arrival of Europeans to the Americas. Tortilla filled with salsa, vegetables and served as a snack.
instructions:
Take a bowl, add garlic, chopped green chilies, coriander leaves, tomatoes, onions, cumin powder, salt, squeeze lime juice and mix it later check for seasoning.
Add kidney bean, tomato ketchup and mix it well. Salsa is ready.
Heat the pan, cook tortillas on both sides and keep aside.
Now spread cream cheese on it and in middle portions spread lettuce, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, green bell pepper, salsa, grated cheese and close the edges.
Roll it and cut it into two pieces.Now the tortillas stuffed with red bean salsa is ready to serve.

name: VERMICELLI SOYA UPMA
desc: Semiya upma or vermicelli upma is one of the regular breakfast that is made in most South Indian homes. It can be made of rava, vermicelli, poha, sabudana, oats or millets.
instructions:
In a pan add oil, hing, cumin seeds, mustard seeds, urad dal, curry leaves and saute it till the color changes.
Then add chopped ginger, chopped green chilies, chopped onions and saute it.
Later add salt, vermicelli and on a low flame roast them well.
In a hot pan add water to boil it.
Add boiling water into the vermicelli and mix it.
Cover the pan and leave it for cooking.
Then add cooked soya beans and leave it for 2-3 minutes.
Vermicelli is ready then switch off the flame.
Transfer into a serving plate and serve with pickle. Now vermicelli soya upma is ready.

name: TAWA PANEER MASALA SANDWICH
desc: Paneer masala sandwich it is filled with potato masala and creamy paneer with some spicy green chutney. Serve it by itself or with ketchup or green chutney.
instructions:
In a bowl add paneer, bottle gourd, salt, coriander,  green chilies, white pepper powder, all purpose flour, mix it and make a patties.
Take a pan add oil, shallow fry the patties in two sides.
When it is done switch off the flame.
Take another pan add oil, onions, garlic, ginger, salt, turmeric powder, tomato puree, chili powder, mix it and cook it for 4-5 minutes.
Then add water, green bell pepper, sugar, mix it and cook it for 2-3 minutes.
Take a plate, place the patties and pour the sauce, garnish with spring onion.Now the tawa paneer masala sandwich is ready.

name: MASALA OATS PANIYARAM
desc: Masala Oats Paniyaram is made using left over idli or dosa batter. It is a healthy, quick breakfast. The recipes using oats are not only healthy but it is also quick and tasty. Without much effort, a comforting breakfast is ready.
instructions:
Take idli or dosa batter add oats, onions, finely chopped curry leaves, green chilies, finely chopped ginger, coriander leaves, garam masala powder, salt, soda and mix it well.
Preheat the paniyaram pan add oil and pour the batter.
Cover it and let it cook.
Then add oil on top of it.
Using a spoon turn the paniyaram, check the sides. If they are browned, flip them over gently and allow them to cook on the other side.
Repeat the same process with the rest of the batter.
Remove from the paniyaram and place it in a serving plate.Now the Masala oats paniyaram is ready.

name: Eggless Caramel Custard
desc: Eggless caramel custard, a good alternative for those who hate drinking plain milk. It is a light and tasty pudding with a good amount of calcium.
instructions:
Take a bowl, add milk, custard powder, yogurt, essence, condense milk and mix nicely.
Heat non stick pan, add sugar and allow it caramelise and switch off flame.
Pour this caramelised mixture at the bottom of silicon mould and on top pour mixed milk mixture.
Take a pressure cooker with water, place filled mould and steam cook with closed lid for 15 minutes without putting whistle.
Remove from mould using hand and transfer into serving plate.Eggless caramel custard is now ready to serve.

name: EGG RICE
desc: Egg Fried Rice is a favorite Indo-chinese food at Mumbai as well as other places in India. It is a great hit with kids as well as fantastic for those who are not attracted to chicken. This is fast, simple and balanced recipe.
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, green chilies, ginger garlic paste, turmeric powder, salt (to taste) and saute it.
To it, add eggs and cook it by stirring occasionally for 1-2 minutes.
Then add carrots to the same pan and cook for some more time.
At last, add rice, salt and mix nicely.Now Egg rice is ready to serve.

name: CORIANDER AND MINT RICE
desc: Coriander Mint rice, the paste is cooked and mixed with steamed rice, the paste add flavour of mint to the rice. Serve with raita of your choice.
instructions:
Heat ghee in a pan and add ginger, green chillies, coriander leaves, mint leaves and saute it.
To it add onions and saute it, later cooked rice, salt and saute it.
Switch off flame, add bitter gourd powder and mix nicely.Now coriander and mint rice is ready to serve.

name: CHICKEN GOLD COIN
desc: This is a non vegetarian snack recipe. How to make Chicken Gold Coin -Sesame seeds lend a special touch to these Chinese style chicken mince patties.
instructions:
Take a bread and cut into roundels.
In a bowl and add chicken mince, garlic, green chilies, coriander leaves, red chili powder, salt, and mix nicely.
Take small dumpling, place on top of bread then place another bread and press it.
In another bowl, add corn flour along with little water and make a  thin slurry.
Dip stuffed chicken in corn slurry and deep fry in oil.
Later, transfer to paper towel and allow it to rest for some more time.Now chicken gold coin is ready to serve.

name: WARQUI ROTI AND PAPAYA PLASTIC CHUTNEY
desc: Punjabi Style Sweet Warqi Roti tasty and yummy. Try this Sweet Warqi Roti recipe.
instructions:
Take a bowl add flour, salt, sugar, lemon juice, saffron, milk then make it a dough and rest it.
Take raw papaya cut into thin slices then cut into pieces.
In a pan add water, papaya pieces, pinch salt and sugar.
Boil it for 20-25 minutes which becomes like chutney called as plastic chutney.
Take the dough make it like a big chapati and apply butter to it.
Firstly fold it then start rolling it and cut into pieces.
Then layer it one on top of it.
3-4 layers of it which forms like one particular dough.
Repeat the same process for rest also.
In boiling mixture i.e. plastic chutney add lemon juice, raisins and leave it.
Now take the dough and start rolling it to 4-5 inches.
In a pan add nigella seeds and roast it.
Once the chutney is ready transfer these roasted into the plastic chutney and cook it.
Take a pan add oil and shallow fry the roti.
Repeat the same process for other roti's also.
Place the roti in serving plate and add plastic chutney on top of it. New the warqui roti and papaya plastic chutney is ready to serve.
